anya-e0806n1:3_1: sātthakattamassa dassetuñca ‘na tāva…pe… sātthakattā’ti vuttaṁ, ummattakādivākyamiti
anya-e0806n1:3_2: ‘dasa dāḷimā, cha apūpā, kuṇḍamajājinaṁ, palālapiṇḍo’iccādikaṁ, avayavatthāna maññamaññanāti
anya-e0806n1:4_0: Atha aādyādisaddānaṁ sādhuttānvākhyānāya idaṁ vacanamiccādivikappantarasambhave kathaṁ
anya-e0806n1:4_1: niyamo vuttiyaṁ vuttenatthena sātthakattamiccāsaṅkiya tesamihānupayogittaṁ kamena
anya-e0806n1:4_3: vuttiyaṁ vakkhamāno attho yassa taṁ tathā vuttaṁ, sādhūnaṁ sādhusaddānaṁ anusāsanaṁ
anya-e0806n1:4_4: ākhyānaṁ attho payojanaṁ yassa tanti viggaho.
anya-e0806n1:5_1: sādhuttānusāsanassa dassanato, lakkhaṇantarena sādhubhāvassa anvākhyātattāti āpubbādāiccasmā
anya-e0806n1:5_2: “dādhātvī”ti (5-45) ippaccaye ākāralope ca ādīti aādiyesanti aññapadatthasamāse yomhi
anya-e0806n1:5_3: “yosu jhissa pume”ti (2-93) ‘ṭe aādayo’ti, tayo ca cattālīsā cāti cattha samāse “tadaminādīni”ti
anya-e0806n1:5_4: cata lopeca rasse ca titālīsāti, ‘vaṇṇa-vaṇṇane’iccasmā “bhāvakārakesva ghaṇa ghakā”ti
anya-e0806n1:5_5: (5-44) appaccayeyomhi ṭādese vaṇṇāiti ca sijjhanato, payoganiyamatthanti titālīsavaṇṇasaddesu
anya-e0806n1:5_6: paresu eva aādisaddo payujjīyatīti evaṁ payoganiyamatthaṁ, ayampi vikappantara sambhāvanā
anya-e0806n1:5_7: “abhūtatabbhāve karāsabhūyoge vikārā cī”ti (4-119) payoganiyamassā jhāyamānassa diṭṭhattā,
anya-e0806n1:5_8: ṭhānyādesatthanti aādisaddassa ṭhāne titālīsavaṇṇasaddā ādesā honti tesaṁ vā so iti,
anya-e0806n1:5_9: tadanurūpāyāti ṭhānyādesānurūpāya chaṭṭhī vibhattiyā, atoyevāti agamāgamianurūpāya
anya-e0806n1:5_10: chaṭṭhiyā abhāvato yeva, agamāgami bhāvatthanti aādisaddassa titālīsa vaṇṇasaddā
anya-e0806n1:5_11: āgamā honti tesaṁ vā so iti, etesupi saṅkā, “yavāsare” (1-30) “suña sassa”iti (2-53)
anya-e0806n1:5_12: ādesāgamānaṁ dassanena, āgama liṅgābhāvatoti ukāra kakāra makārānaṁ abhāvato, visesanavisessa
anya-e0806n1:5_13: bhāvatthanti titālīsavaṇṇasaddānaṁ aādisaddo visesanaṁ, te vā tasse-ti, etthāpi saṅkā
anya-e0806n1:5_15: saddalakkhaṇena saddasaṅkharaṇassa pakatattā vuttaṁ, tattha kāraṇamāha- ‘rūpavisesūpa
anya-e0806n1:5_16: lakkhaṇābhāvā’ti, rūpavisesassa upalakkhaṇa nimittaṁ tassaabhāvāti attho, na hi visesana
anya-e0806n1:5_17: visessabhāve paṭipādite aādyādisaddānaṁ rūpavisesassa saṅkharaṇaṁ kataṁ siyāti, yadi
anya-e0806n1:5_18: esova saddasaṅkharaṇanti gayheyya, tathā sati ‘nīluppala’miccādīnampi vattabbatā
anya-e0806n1:5_19: āpajjeyyāti nāssa tadattha tāpi sambhāvīyate, loke sīhaguṇassa mānavake dassanato
anya-e0806n1:5_20: upacārena ‘sīho-yaṁ mānavako’ti tagguṇajjhāropopi dissati, tadatthampetaṁ na hotīti
anya-e0806n1:5_21: dassanatthaṁ ‘tagguṇajjhāropanatthampetaṁ na hotī’ti vuttaṁ, tassa aādisaddassa,
anya-e0806n1:5_22: tesaṁ titālīsavaṇṇasaddānaṁ vā guṇo aādittādi, tassa ajjhāropanaṁ-titālīsavaṇṇasaddesu
anya-e0806n1:5_23: vā aādisaddeyeva vā āropanaṁ, tadatthampetaṁ suttaṁ na hotīti attho, tattha kāraṇamāha-
anya-e0806n1:5_25: yathāvutta vikappantarābhāve ubhayatthamidaṁ siyā, tattha paribhāsatthaṁ na hoti…
anya-e0806n1:8_0: Mariyādattho ettha ādisaddoti āha-‘ādimariyādā bhūto’ti, upalakkhaṇattāti upalakkhiyamānānamākārādīnaṁ
anya-e0806n1:8_2: kāriyenāti vaṇṇasaññābhavanādinā, na gunnampi ānayanaṁ bhavati..gunnamupasajjanīya
anya-e0806n1:8_3: bhūtattā aññapadatthasseva padhānattā, saññāyā bhāveti akārassa vaṇṇasaññāya abhāve,
anya-e0806n1:8_6: yogavibhāgena, itarathā byañjanaparasseva rassatte dassite titālīsaiti abyañjane
anya-e0806n1:8_7: padaṁ na sampajjeyyāti viññāyati, itarītarayogacatthe bahuvacanena bhavitabbanti
anya-e0806n1:8_8: āha-‘ekavacanampanā’tiādi, vippaṭipatti aññathābhāvo, rassa e okārehi tecattālīsakkharānanti
anya-e0806n1:8_9: sambandho, e okāre hīti sahatthe tatiyā, sakkatānusārenāti sakkate “sandhi yakkharānaṁ
anya-e0806n1:8_10: rassā na santī”ti vuttassa anusārena, kocīti sā sanappasādakacoḷiyabuddhappiyācariyaṁ
anya-e0806n1:8_11: dasseti, na hiccādiṁ vadato-yamadhippāyo ‘rassāivāti ivasaddo sādhammopamājotako
anya-e0806n1:8_12: vā siyā vedhammopamājotako vā, yadi tāva vedhammopamājotako, rassadhammassa e okāresva
anya-e0806n1:8_13: sambhavā tesaṁ dīghakālappavattito te dīghāyeva siyuṁ, yadi pana sādhammopamājotako,
anya-e0806n1:8_14: tesu rassadhammassasambhavā rassakālappavattito rassāeva te siyunti ‘etthātiādīsu
anya-e0806n1:8_15: e okārānaṁ uccāraṇakālakataṁ rassattameva hotī’ti, rassakālavantoyevāti evasaddo
anya-e0806n1:8_16: sogate vaṇṇavinimmuttassa kālassevābhāvā vaṇṇānañca paccakkha siddhattā pamāṇasiddhaṁ
anya-e0806n1:8_17: pāramatthika me okārānaṁ rassakālavantataṁ dīpeti, atthāti vadato panāyamadhippāyo
anya-e0806n1:8_18: ‘etthātiādīsu yadi ekārādayo dīghāeva saṁyogapubbattā rassāva siyuṁtathā sati atthāti
anya-e0806n1:8_19: etthāpi dīghova ākāro saṁyogapubbattārasso iva uccatīti āpajjeyya, tasmā uccāraṇakālakatova
anya-e0806n1:8_20: rassadīghabhāvo gahetabbo’ti, kaccāyanavuttivaṇṇanā ñāso, taññāpaneti bahiddhā aññesamakkharānaṁ
anya-e0806n1:8_21: ñāpane, payojanābhāvāti tena sādhetabbassa kassaci iṭṭhassa abhāvamāha, kimettha
anya-e0806n1:8_22: samudāye vākyaparisamatti, udāhu avayaveti āha- ‘pacceka’nti, aññathā ‘rukkhā vana’ntiādīsu
anya-e0806n1:8_23: viya samudāye vākyaparisamattiyaṁ “iyuvaṇṇā jhalā namassante” (1-9) iccādikaṁ na
anya-e0806n1:8_24: sijjhatīti, paccekaṁ vaṇṇā nāmahontīti akāro vaṇṇo nāma hoti ākāro vaṇṇo nāma hotītiādinā,
anya-e0806n1:8_25: avayaveccādinā vuttiyaṁ avuttepi ‘pacceka’nti vacane sadiṭṭhantaṁ kāraṇamāha, diṭṭhantopanīto
anya-e0806n1:8_26: tyattho sukhena paṭipattuṁ sakkāti, ettha hi paccekanti avuttepi devadatto bhojīyatūtiādinā
anya-e0806n1:8_27: paccekaṁ bhuñjikiriyā parisamāpīyate, tenāha-‘na coccate’ iccādi, athavā samudāyepi
anya-e0806n1:8_28: vākyaparisamā pattiyaṁ sati samudāye pavattā saddā avayavesupi vattantīti ‘samuddekadesadassanepi
anya-e0806n1:8_29: samuddo diṭṭho, khandhekadesa bhūtāyapi paññāya paññākkhandhotiādīsu viya na doso,
anya-e0806n1:8_30: teneva vuttiyaṁ ‘pacceka’nti na vuttaṁ, vaṇṇasaddassa guṇādyanekatthattepi pakaraṇato
anya-e0806n1:8_31: akārādayovettha vuccantīti āha-‘vaṇṇīyati’ccādi, pakaraṇatopi attho vibhajjate, vuttaṁ hi–
anya-e0806n1:11_0: Nanu jhalādisaññā viya lahusaññaṁ akatvā kasmā gurusaññā katāti codanaṁ manasi nidhāya
anya-e0806n1:11_1: ruḷhi anvatthavasena dvippakārāsu saññāsu jhālāti ruḷhi saññātthābhāvena vohārasukhamattapayojanā,
anya-e0806n1:11_2: anvatthasaññā pana tappayojanāpi hoti tadaññappayojanā pīti dassetumāha- ‘eva’miccādi,
anya-e0806n1:11_3: vaṇṇīyatī attho etehīti vuttamatthaṁ anugatā anugatatthā vaṇṇasaññā taṁ, saddādhigamanīyassāti
anya-e0806n1:11_4: saddena viññātabbassa, vaṇṇaṁ mūlamassāti vaṇṇamūlako-attho, tassa bhāvo vaṇṇamūlakatā,
anya-e0806n1:11_5: atthassa vaṇṇamūlakataṁ sādheti ‘sāpi’ccādinā, vaṇṇaṁ rūpaṁ sabhāvo etesanti vaṇṇarūpāni-padāni,
anya-e0806n1:11_6: samudāyo pādānaṁ rūpamassāti samudāyarūpaṁ vākyaṁ, vibhatyantamatthajotakaṁ padaṁ,
anya-e0806n1:11_7: padasamudāyo vākyaṁ, sabbañcetamupacārena vaṇṇasaddavacanīyattaṁ gacchati vaṇṇamayattāti
anya-e0806n1:11_8: sabbopi sammutiparamatthabhedabhinno attho vākyādhigamanīyo vaṇṇeneva viññāyati nāma
anya-e0806n1:11_9: tasmā yathā vuttamattha visesadassanaṁlahusaññāya na sakkāti tadatthamakārādīnaṁ
anya-e0806n1:11_10: gurubhūtā vaṇṇasaññā katāti adhippāyo, sammuti saṅketavasena pavatto vohāro, paramattho
anya-e0806n1:11_11: sanibbāno pañcakkhandho. Ubhohi panetehi bhinno tatiyo koṭṭhāso nāma natthi, tathāca vuttaṁ–
anya-e0806n1:12: Duve saccāni akkhāsi, sambuddho vadataṁ varo,
anya-e0806n1:17_0: “Ādayo titālīsa vaṇṇā” “titālīsādayo vaṇṇā”ti vā vattabbanti na tathā sati sandiddhaṁ
anya-e0806n1:17_1: suttaṁ siyāti, nanu satthādo maṅgalavacanena bhavitabbaṁ, akāro paṭisedhatthopi hotīti
anya-e0806n1:17_2: (na) satthādo siddhasaddassopahitattā, atha hotva pubbā jhālādi saññā, saddasādhanamattappayojanattā
anya-e0806n1:17_3: pana sabbavidhānassa pubbācariya saññāvālametthāti kiṁ punāpi vaṇṇādisaññāvidhānena
anya-e0806n1:17_4: ganthagārava karaṇenāti saccametaṁ, pubbācariyesu pana gāravaṁ tadanugamanañca dīpetuṁ
anya-e0806n1:17_5: kāci saññāyopyanvākhyāyante, yajjevaṁ saṁyogasabbanāmalopādayopi saññā pubbācariyehi
anya-e0806n1:17_6: vuttā vattabbāti nanu bho vuttamevāmhehi’kāci saññāyo ākhyāyante’ti, kintadākhyānadvārena
anya-e0806n1:17_7: bhavatā tāpi viññātuṁ na sakkāti, kesañci sātthakattopi pativaṇṇamatthānupaladdhito
anya-e0806n1:17_9: hotevākārādito vibhatti, lopena niddiṭṭhattā panassā assavanaṁ sannikaṁsavacanicchābhāvā
anya-e0806n1:17_10: saṁhitāyāniddeso, anukkamoti ādonissayā sarāvuttā, tato nissitā byañjanā, saresupi
anya-e0806n1:17_11: ekaṭṭhāniyā akārādayo bahuttā paṭhamaṁ vuttā ṭhānānukkamena, tato dvijā ṭhānānukkamena,
anya-e0806n1:17_12: tesupi rassāva lahuttā paṭhamaṁ vuttā, tato dīghā, byañjanesupi vaggā bahuttā ṭhānappaṭipāṭiyā
anya-e0806n1:17_13: paṭhamaṁ vuttā, tato yakārādayo, vaggesu ca aghosā paṭhamaṁ vuttā, tato ghosā, tesu
anya-e0806n1:17_14: ca sithilā paṭhamaṁ vuttā, tato dhanitā, tatthāpi appakattā dvijā pañcamā vuttā,
anya-e0806n1:17_15: tato yaralavā ghosabhūtā ṭhānānukkamena, tato dhanitā sakāraha kārā, tesupihakāro
anya-e0806n1:17_16: kesañci orasopi hotīti dvijattā pacchā vutto, kehici “laḷānamaviseso”ti dvinnamavisese
anya-e0806n1:17_17: vuccamānepi lipibhedena ṭhānabhedena ca bhinnattā ḷakāro visuṁ akkharabhāvena gahito,
anya-e0806n1:17_18: sopi ghosabhāvena ṭhānānukkamenaca hakārato paraṁ vutto niggahītaṁ pana sarattādisabbavinimmuttattā
anya-e0806n1:17_19: sabbapacchā vuttanti akārādīnamayamanukkamo, imassevānukkamassa manasi vipassa vattamānattā
anya-e0806n1:17_20: titālīsāti gaṇanāparicchedassa dassitattā ca ‘niggahītantā’ti vuttiyaṁ vuttaṁ, pakataṁ
anya-e0806n1:17_21: sādhusaddānvākhyānaṁ, na vaṇṇīyate, ti saddasaṅkharaṇa saṅkhāta mukhyappayojanābhāvā,
anya-e0806n1:17_22: kiñcāpi na vaṇṇīyate, amhehi pana kathamakārādīnamayamanukkamo uppannoti sissānaṁ
anya-e0806n1:17_23: kaṅkhā vicchedappayojanampati anukkamasaddassa atthakathanabyājena vaṇṇito yevāti,
anya-e0806n1:17_24: karīyante uccārīyante etenāti karaṇaṁ, tattha jivhāmajjhaṁ tālujānaṁ, jivhopaggaṁ
anya-e0806n1:17_25: muddhajānaṁ, jivhaggaṁ, dantajānaṁ sesānaṁ sakaṭṭhānaṁ karaṇaṁ, payatti payatanaṁ,
anya-e0806n1:17_26: tampana vaṇṇuccāraṇato abbhantaro bāhiyo ca ussāho, tattha abbhantarapayatanaṁ-saṁvutattamakārassa,
anya-e0806n1:17_27: vivaṭattaṁ sarānaṁ sakārahakārānañca phuṭṭhattaṁ vaggānaṁ, īsaṁphuṭṭhattaṁ yaralavānaṁ,
anya-e0806n1:17_29: payojanasambhavā āha-‘ṭhānampanā’tiādi, tiṭṭhanti ettha uppattivasena vaṇṇāti ṭhānaṁ,
anya-e0806n1:17_30: “e onama vaṇṇe”ti (1-37) sutte vaṇṇeti kathanameva vaṇṇasaññākaraṇe payojanaṁ, yathāvuttamatthamaññatra
anya-e0806n1:17_32: kvattho kasmiṁ sutte payojanaṁ taṁ dasseti “sarolopo sare”ccādī’ti evamādinā attho
anya-e0806n1:17_33: daṭṭhabbo, ñāpeti vaṇṇalopanti ñāpakaṁ, kasmā pana’so cemināva ñāpakena siddho’ti
anya-e0806n1:17_34: vuccati nanu ‘tadaminādīni”ti (1-47) suttaṁ dissatīti, (saccaṁ) tathāpi pakārantaroyampi
anya-e0806n1:17_35: vaṇṇalope dassitoti viññātabbaṁ, evasaddo pana ‘yadi ñāpakena vaṇṇalopo siyā so imināva
anya-e0806n1:19_0: Nanu aādayoti paṭhamantenuvattante kathamettha’tatthā’ti sattamīniddiṭṭhatāti āha-‘tañcā’tiādi,
anya-e0806n1:19_2: sambajjhamāne cādhāratthena bhavitabbanti ādhāratthavasena sattamī vibhattiyā parivattanenāti
anya-e0806n1:19_3: attho, atthavasā sattamiyā vipariṇāmasambhavāyevasutte avijjamānepi‘tatthā’ti vuttiyaṁ
anya-e0806n1:19_4: vuttaṁ, ādodasannamanaññatthapavattisambhavato tesaṁ aādayo visayabhāvenapi sakkā
anya-e0806n1:19_5: parikappetunti vuttaṁ-‘tesu visayabhūtesū’ti, niddhāraṇatthopi yujjateva… vaṇṇasamudāyato
anya-e0806n1:19_6: tadekadesabhūtāna mādo vaṇṇānaṁ dasasaṅkhyāguṇena niddhāriyamānattā, ādimhi dasa
anya-e0806n1:19_7: vaṇṇāti vutte avuttānampi avassaṁ vattabbānaṁ ūnapūraṇatthamajjhāhāro hotīti vuttaṁ-
anya-e0806n1:19_8: avaṭṭhitā niddiṭṭhā vā’ti, ekādīna maṭṭhārasantānaṁ saṅkhyānaṁ saṅkhyeyye vattanato
anya-e0806n1:19_9: āha-‘dasasaṅkhyāya paricchinnattā’ti, gayhupagānaṁ rassae ovaṇṇānampi kaccāyane viya
anya-e0806n1:19_10: apariccāgā anūnā, agayhupagānaṁ tadaññesaṁ kesañci sarānaṁ pariccagā anadhikā, dasasaddassa
anya-e0806n1:19_11: saṅkhyeyya vuttittā dasannampi adhikatavaṇṇānaññattā vuttaṁ-‘dasannampī’tiādi, sayaṁ
anya-e0806n1:19_12: pubbā’rāja=cittiyaṁ’tīsmā kvimhi antalope samāse ca tadaminādittā niruttinayena vā
anya-e0806n1:19_13: sarasaddo nipphajjatīti, ‘sara-gatihiṁ sācintāsu’ iccasmā appaccayena vā nippajjatīti
anya-e0806n1:21_0: Teti’ādo’ti sattamyantattā apare dve parāmasati, heṭṭhā viyāti heṭṭhā vuttaṁ atthavasā
anya-e0806n1:21_1: vibhattivipariṇāmaṁ upameti, atova viññāyamānatthavasena tesu’ti vuttaṁ, tesuti pana
anya-e0806n1:21_2: niddhāraṇattavivacchāyaṁ tampi sambhavatīti tesaṁ vaṇṇānaṁ majjhe dvedveti dvisaṅkhyāya
anya-e0806n1:21_3: niddhāraṇatthopi veditabbo, vicchāyaṁ vutti yassa so vicchāvutti-dvisaddo, vicchāvuttitā
anya-e0806n1:21_4: cāssa savaṇṇattaguṇena dvinnaṁ (‘byāpitu) miṭṭhattā, kamenāvaṭṭhiteti iminā akārādivaṇṇappabandhassa
anya-e0806n1:21_5: anādikālasiddhaṁ kamasiddhattamāha. Nanu samānā vaṇṇā savaṇṇātyanvatthe savaṇṇasadde
anya-e0806n1:21_6: sati kataṁ rassadīghānaṁ savaṇṇasaññā siyā… asamānattā etesanti, netadatthivaṇṇappabandhassa
anya-e0806n1:21_7: kamasiddhattā vacanabalenevāsamānānampi hotevāti, nevampi vattuṁ yuttaṁ“dvedve savaṇṇā”ti
anya-e0806n1:21_9: Tiṭṭhanti ettha vaṇṇā cittajattepi abhibyatti vasenāti ṭhānaṁ kaṇṭhādi, tena katanti
anya-e0806n1:21_10: samāso, kaṇṭhatātu iti catte pāṇyaṅgattā napuṁsakattaṁ. Pañcamehi vaggapañcamehi.
anya-e0806n1:21_11: Antaṭṭhākīti vaggānamante tiṭṭhantīti antaṭṭhā, tāhi, yuttassāti brahmacariyā, guyha’ntiādīsu
anya-e0806n1:21_12: yuttassa. Kecīti aniyamena vuttaṁ, te pana–
anya-e0806n1:23: Oraso iti viññeyyo, kaṇṭhajo tadasaṁyuto”ti vadanti.
anya-e0806n1:25_0: Vattateti atthavasā vibhattivipariṇāmena vattate, nanu cetyādicodanā, nesadosoccādi
anya-e0806n1:25_1: parihāro, dosābhāve kāraṇa māha-‘yoyo…pe… patīyate’ti, vuttaṁ samatteti-‘nahi’ccādinā,
anya-e0806n1:25_2: nanu ca pubbasaddo yamekattā ekaṁ pubbamācikkhati na sakalanti kathaṁ “pubbo’ti vutte
anya-e0806n1:25_3: yoyoti ñāyati ‘yoyo pubbo’ti ca vutte ‘tesu dvīsu’ti ettha’dvīsu dvīsu’ti idaṁ kathaṁ
anya-e0806n1:27_0: Sesamiccādinā‘tesu dvīsūti savaṇṇasaññakesu dvīsu’ iccādi kamatidissati. Lahusaññā
anya-e0806n1:27_1: rassassa, saṁyogapubbassa rassassa dīghassa ca gurusaññā na vattabbā… uccāraṇavasenevānvatthasaññāti
anya-e0806n1:29_2: karaṇe anappaccaye rūpaṁ, napuṁsakattampissāvagamayituṁ ‘upakārakānī’ti vuttaṁ, byañjanattaṁ
anya-e0806n1:29_3: diṭṭhantena phuṭayati ‘yathā’iccādinā, yathā odanassupakārakāni sūpādīni byañjanāni,
anya-e0806n1:29_4: tathā sarānamupakārakānīti adhippāyo, byañjanampana addhamattikaṁ, vuttaṁ hi–
anya-e0806n1:34_0: Sajātyapekkhāya samudāyavācittepi kādayotī anuvattanato vaggasaddena kakhagaghañādayova
anya-e0806n1:34_1: gayhanti, pañca parimāṇamassa pañcakovaggo, “tamassa parimāṇaṁ ṇiko cā”ti (4-41)
anya-e0806n1:34_2: ko, sutte ādibhūto pañcasaddo pañcasaṅkhyāparicchedaṁ kurumāno māvasānānaṁ vaggānaṁ
anya-e0806n1:34_3: bahuttaṁ gametīti ‘pañcakā’ti vuttaṁ, vaggāti bahuvacanato paccekanti viññāyati,
anya-e0806n1:34_4: vajjenti yakārādayobhi vaggā, paṭhamakkharavasena pana kavaggādivohāro.
anya-e0806n1:36_0: Anekatthattā dhātūna muccāraṇatthopettha gaṇhātīti nipubbā tato kammanti ttappaccaye
anya-e0806n1:36_1: ññimhi pādisamāse dīgheca rūpaṁ dassento ‘rassā’tiādīmāha, pīḷanatthato niggahanaṁ
anya-e0806n1:36_2: niggaho, ‘i-ajjhena gatīsu’iccasmā kattari kammani-iti vattabbaṁ, itaṁ uccāritanti
anya-e0806n1:36_3: attho ttappaccaye itaṁ, niggahena itanti amādisa māse rūpaṁ dassento ‘karaṇaṁ niggahena
anya-e0806n1:38: Catthasamāsoti itarītarayogadvandasamāso. Atteti muni saddādivacanīye atthe, namatītīmassetaṁ kammaṁ,
anya-e0806n1:40: Taṁ sabbatthe namanato, viduṁ nāmanti tabbidū.
anya-e0806n1:41_1: syādyantapakatirūpanti paccayā paṭhamaṁ karīyatīti pakati, sā eva rūpanti pakatirūpaṁ,
anya-e0806n1:41_3: padaṁ padaṁ pati paṭipade, paṭipadaṁ niyuttaṁ pāṭipadikaṁ. Visesanenāti sutte ‘namassante’ti
anya-e0806n1:41_4: vuttena ivaṇṇuvaṇṇānaṁ visesanena. Ākhyātassāti pacatiādino. Ādimajjhavattinoti inda
anya-e0806n1:41_5: udakasaddādīnaṁ ādo, pakhumādīnaṁ majjheca vattino. Padesesūti “jhalā sassa no”ti
anya-e0806n1:41_6: (2-83) ādikesu suttappadesesu, aniṭṭhapasaṅga (saṅkaṁ) nivattetīti sambandho, aniṭṭhappasaṅgonāma
anya-e0806n1:41_7: nāmāti (potthake) pacati-inda (udaka pakhuma) saddādīna manta ādimajjhabhūtaivaṇṇādīnaṁ
anya-e0806n1:41_8: jhalasaññā vidhāya tato parāsaṁ sādi vibhattīnaṁ “jhalā sassa no”ti (2-81) ādīhi
anya-e0806n1:41_9: ‘no’ ādesādimhi kate ‘pacatino, indano, udakano, pakhumano’tiādi rūpappasaṅgo, nanucādiādi
anya-e0806n1:41_10: codanā. Vattabbanti sutte vattabbaṁ. Byāsaniddesenāti asamāsaniddesena. Tadayuttantiādi
anya-e0806n1:41_11: parihāro, tanti taṁ codyaṁ, satihītiādinā ayuttattaṁ samattheti, dvīsuttaresu yogesūti
anya-e0806n1:41_12: uparimesu “pitthiyaṁ” “ghā”ti dvīsu suttesu. Itthiyanti idanti “pitthiya”nti sutte
anya-e0806n1:41_13: itthiyanti idaṁ padaṁ. Vaṇṇavisesanaṁ siyāti “pitthiya”nti sutte ‘iyuvaṇṇā’ti anuvattanato
anya-e0806n1:41_14: ‘itthiyaṁ ivaṇṇuvaṇṇā’ti evaṁ ivaṇṇu vaṇṇā “gho”ti sutte ‘itthiyaṁ ā’tievaṁ avaṇṇassa
anya-e0806n1:41_15: ca visesanaṁ bhaveyya. Vaṇṇavisesane virodhamāha ‘evañce’ccādi, nāmassanteti asamāsaniddese
anya-e0806n1:41_16: tvavirodhamāha- ‘byāse’ccādi. Sakkānāmavisesanaṁ kātunti dvīsu suttesu itthiyantiādinā
anya-e0806n1:41_17: vakkhamānakkamena. Nāmassa anto nāmantoti samāsassa uttarapadatthappadhānattā samāse
anya-e0806n1:41_18: guṇībhūtassa nāmassa itthiyanti idaṁ visesanaṁ kātuṁ na sakkāti adhippāyo, vacanamantarenāti
anya-e0806n1:43: Kokilā kumudānī vo, pasevante vanaṁ jalaṁ” (260).
anya-e0806n1:46_0: Itthiyaṁ nāmassāti ca, ante ivaṇṇuvaṇṇāti ca vutte tesamā dhārādheyyasambandho ādheyyassādhāre
anya-e0806n1:46_1: pavattiṁ vinā na sambhavatīti ajjhāhāravasena ‘vattamānā’ti vuttiyaṁ vuttaṁ. Ivaṇṇu
anya-e0806n1:46_2: vaṇṇāti apekkhiya‘visesīyantī’ti bahuvacanametaṁ sambandhassa purisādhīnatāya nāmantīminā
anya-e0806n1:48_0: Itthiyaṁ nāmassanteti ca vattate. Heṭṭhā sabbattha saññino niddisiya saññāya niddiṭṭhattā
anya-e0806n1:48_1: tattha viya visuṁ saññino paṭhamamaniddese asanto viyāti dosalesamālambiya codayati
anya-e0806n1:48_2: nanhace’tyādinā. Tattha setoti vijjamānassa saññino. Kāriyenāti saññākāriyena. Pariharati
anya-e0806n1:48_3: ‘nāyaṁ doso’tiādinā. Pacchāvuttamattenāti “ghā”ti sutte kāriyino ākārassa pacchā
anya-e0806n1:48_4: vuttamattena. Nacāti ettha casaddo vattabbantarasamuccaye, aparampi kiñci vattabbamaniyamarūpamatthīti
anya-e0806n1:50: Āsaddo ābhimukhye, anabhimukhamabhimukhaṁ katvā lapanaṁ kathanamāla panaṁ, tasmiṁ ālapane, ālapanatthe vihito sīti attho.
anya-e0806n1:55_0: Vacanārambhayojanamāha–‘yaṁ visesanabhāvene’ccādi, yanti aniyamena “ato yonaṁ ṭāṭe”ti
anya-e0806n1:55_1: (2-43) ādīsu atotiādikaṁ visesanabhāvena vattumicchitaṁ parāmasati, tenāti vise sanattenu-pādiyamānena
anya-e0806n1:55_2: yaṁ saddaniddiṭṭhena atotiādikena karaṇabhūtena, yathākathañcitabbatoti ādo majjhe-nte
anya-e0806n1:55_3: vā sabbhāvato yenakenaci ākārena abhedopacārena akārādivisesanavato nāmādino, tadantatthanti
anya-e0806n1:55_4: taṁ atotyādi visesanamante, nādo na majjhe yassa taṁ tadantaṁ, taṁ attho payojanaṁ
anya-e0806n1:55_5: yassāti aññapadattho, vattāyattāti vattuno āyattā… attāvāttano vacane padhānanti,
anya-e0806n1:55_6: tassāti vattuno, sāti vacanicchā, payogānusā renāti jinavacanānusārena, itīti kāraṇatthe
anya-e0806n1:55_7: nipāto, iminā kāraṇenāti attho, na sabbatthappasaṅgoti saṁhitādividhimhi sabbattha
anya-e0806n1:55_8: tadanta vidhippasaṅgo na hoti, tathāhi “saro lopo sare”ti (1-26) ettha saroti visesanabhāvena
anya-e0806n1:55_9: vacanicchāya sabbhāve saroti tatrā’dīnaṁ visesananti yathākathañcisarādisaramajjhasarantānaṁ
anya-e0806n1:55_12: ‘ime’tiādinā vattabbatā āpajjeyyāti payogaṁ nānusaṭā nāmasiyunti na sabbattha tadanta
anya-e0806n1:55_14: ca yathāyogamavagantabbaṁ, vuttiyaṁ “ato yonaṁ ṭāṭe”ti suttodāharaṇaṁ dassitaṁ, “narā
anya-e0806n1:57_0: Vacanaphalamupadasseti‘yatthe’ccādinā, yattha yasmiṁ “saro lopo sare”tyādike sutte,
anya-e0806n1:57_1: sattamiyāti ‘sare’tiādinā sattamiyā, yassāti sarotiādinā niddiṭṭhassa, kāriyaṁ lopādi,
anya-e0806n1:57_2: sambandhā visesāti saretyādo opasilesikamadhikaraṇaṁ, tañcopasilese bhavamadhikaraṇaṁ
anya-e0806n1:57_3: pubbassa vā paraṁ siyā parassa vā pubbanti pubbaparopasi lesassāvisiṭṭhattā pubbaparānaṁ
anya-e0806n1:57_4: sambandhassa avisesā, parassāpīti na kevalaṁ pubbasseva, satītyasmiṁ atthe jotanīye
anya-e0806n1:57_5: sattamī saṁsattamī santasaddassa samādesena, sattañcetyādivacanamevaṁ sati ghaṭate,
anya-e0806n1:57_6: santi vā santasaddatthe pādi, sutte avuttepi vuttiyaṁ ‘niddese’ti vacane kāraṇamāha-sattañcā’tiādi,
anya-e0806n1:57_7: niddesamantarena sattaṁ na sambhavatīti sambandho, sattamiyā niddese satiyeva taṁ
anya-e0806n1:57_8: sambandhāya sattāya sambhavo, aññathā kimaññantassā patiṭṭhāti adhippāyo, pubbasaddassa
anya-e0806n1:57_9: sambandhisaddattā kinnissāya pubbattamiccāha-‘sattami’ccādi, tanti “saro lopo sare”ti
anya-e0806n1:57_10: suttaṁ, ukārassāti ‘veḷu’iccatra ukārassa, pubbassa…pe… karitvā taṁmanasikatañcodanaṁ
anya-e0806n1:57_11: dassetumāha-‘tamaha’nti ccāditi evamettha sājjhāhāro sambandho veditabbo. Pubbassāti
anya-e0806n1:57_12: sattamī niddiṭṭhato pubbassa, anantarassāti abyavahitassa, vuttaṁ kiñci natthīti
anya-e0806n1:57_16: byavahitepi payogadassane byavahitepi kāriyaṁ pappotī”ti bhassakārādayo vaṇṇenti,
anya-e0806n1:57_17: iha tādisavacanābhāvena vaṇṇādi byavadhānepi siyā”ti, sareccādiparihāravacane-dhippāya
anya-e0806n1:57_18: mubbhāvayati ‘yadipi’ccādinā, mathurāya pāṭaliputtakassa cāntarāḷe gāmādīnaṁ sabbhāvā
anya-e0806n1:57_19: byavadhānepi pubbasaddassa pavattiyā diṭṭhantamāha-‘mathurā’ iccādi, yasmā sareti
anya-e0806n1:57_20: opasilesikādhāre sattamyantaṁ padaṁ, tasmā byavadhāne saralopo na hotīti evaṁ saṅkhepabyākhyānena
anya-e0806n1:57_21: vuttiya mattho veditabbo, na kevalaṁ sareti etthevāti āha- ‘kāriye’ccādi, opasilesikeyevādhāre
anya-e0806n1:57_22: bhavatīti seso, kāraṇamāha-‘vatticchānhavidhānato saddassā’ti, vattuno yā icchā vacanicchā
anya-e0806n1:57_23: tassā anutūlena vidhānato atthassa kathanatoti attho,yena hi yamatthaṁ vattātidhātumicchati
anya-e0806n1:57_24: satīpyabhidhānasā matthiye na tato-ññamatthaṁ saddobhidadhātītyadhippāyo, vatticchā
anya-e0806n1:57_25: vasāye kāraṇamāha’vatticchāpi’ccādi, vattuno suttakārassa icchā vatticchā, kathamupadesato
anya-e0806n1:57_27: ato vakkhamānakāraṇā upadesato vasīyateti sambandho, kintaṁ kāraṇa miccāha-‘yasmā’iccādi,
anya-e0806n1:57_28: anvayasaddenettha gurupārampariyo-padeso vivacchito, yasmā kāraṇā anvayo gurupārampariyo
anya-e0806n1:57_29: padeso gurukulamupagamma pañhakaraṇādinā anvicchīyate gavesīyati, ato kāraṇā guruparamparā
anya-e0806n1:57_31: sāmatthiyampi vuccatetiseso, laghunopāyena saddānamupalakkhaṇe pavattīti byavahitanivattiyā
anya-e0806n1:57_32: vacanantaraka-raṇamanupannaṁ, upapannaṁ vacanantarakaraṇaṁ, tassa ca opasilesikādhāra
anya-e0806n1:57_33: mantarena aññathānupapattiyā ādhāravisesappaṭippattīti idamettha sāmatthiyaṁ, ādhārantareccādinā
anya-e0806n1:57_34: yathāvuttaṁ sāmatthiyaṁ vibhāveti, ādhārantarepīti sabbattha pāṭho dissati, pasaṅgābhāvato
anya-e0806n1:57_35: atthanta-renāpi ādhārantarepi opasilesikādhārepi vacanantarappasaṅgo siyāti sambandhasambhavā
anya-e0806n1:57_36: opasilesikādhāranissayanepi ānisaṁso na dissatīti samuccayatthenāpi natthi payojananti
anya-e0806n1:57_37: vajjetabbo yampi saddoti, nanu kimevaṁ vaṇṇīyate pubbasseveti vacana mevopasilesikamadhikaraṇaṁ
anya-e0806n1:57_38: viññāpayati… tattheva pubbaparatta sambhavāti yomaññate, tassesā kappanā na saṅgatāti
anya-e0806n1:57_40: ‘gaṅgāyaṁ ghoso’ti vutte ghoso gaṅgāyaṁ pubbo vā paro veti gammamānattā sāmīpikepyadhikaraṇe
anya-e0806n1:57_41: pubbaparattassa sambhavāti attho, etāvavuccateti pubbasseva hoti na parassāti ettakameva
anya-e0806n1:57_42: vuccate, tathāca vakkhati-‘kinta’ntiādi, adhikaṁ byavahitanivutyādi na vuccateti
anya-e0806n1:57_43: sambandho, ādisaddenettha chaṭṭhīpakappanā gahitā, chaṭṭhīpakappanāpi sāmattiyā katāti
anya-e0806n1:57_47: ‘tasmātyuttarassa chaṭṭhī niddiṭṭhe pubbassa chaṭṭhīti pubbassa kāriyittapaṭipādanayoggo
anya-e0806n1:57_48: chaṭṭhī tabbodhakapade bhavatityattho, eva dhuttarassetu vi. ujjotaṭīkā ti chaṭṭhīpakappanaṁ
anya-e0806n1:57_49: paṭipādenti ‘yasmiṁ sutte chaṭṭhīniddeso natthi, tattha chaṭṭhīpakappanāyathā siyā’ti,
anya-e0806n1:57_50: idha pana vacanantarābhāvepi yattha chaṭṭhīniddeso natthi, tattha sāmatthiyeneva
anya-e0806n1:57_52: paṭipajjateti sambandho, kāriyayo ganti kāriyasambandhaṁ, yathā “vagge vagganto”ti
anya-e0806n1:57_53: etthānuvattamānaṁ niggahīta’ntidaṁ chaṭṭhīyantaṁ viññāyate, kathaṁ vaggetesā sattamyakatatthā
anya-e0806n1:57_55: sattamiyaṁ pubbasse’ti tathetyavagantabbaṁ. Etāva vuccateti vutte idanti na viññāyateti
anya-e0806n1:57_56: āha ‘kinta’ntiādi, yadāhiccādinā pariyāyapasaṅgakkamaṁ dasseti. Kimidamuccate pariyāyappasaṅge
anya-e0806n1:57_57: niyamatthaṁ vacananti nanu pubbaparānaṁ yugapaduppattiya mācariyavacanappamāṇenāppaṭipattiyaṁ
anya-e0806n1:57_58: vijjhanatthaṁ vacananti kasmā nocca teccāha- ‘yugapadupasiliṭṭhāna’ntyādi, yugapadupasiliṭṭhānamasambhavoti
anya-e0806n1:59_0: Avadhibhāvenāti ‘ato’ccādinā avadhittena, yassāti yo ādino, kāriyanti ‘ṭāṭe’ādikaṁ,
anya-e0806n1:59_1: pubbaparāpekkhattenāvisesāti yathā- ‘gāmā devadatto’ti vutte so tato pubbo parogeti
anya-e0806n1:59_3: (2-41) vuccamāne ato pubbesaṁ yonaṁ athavā paresanti pubbaparāpekkhattenāvadhibhāvassāvisesāti
anya-e0806n1:59_4: maññate, pure viyātyanena sattamiyanti ettha vuttaṁ niddesavacane kāraṇamatidisati,
anya-e0806n1:59_5: vuttiyaṁ ‘narānamere’ti ettha apavādavippaṭisedhe satiparattā ṭāṭeādesānaṁ pavattiṁ
anya-e0806n1:59_6: “ādissā”ti ettha vaṇṇayissāma, atha kimiminā vacanena nanu yato yattha pañcamī niddeso
anya-e0806n1:59_7: tattha sabbattha “mānubandho sarānamantā paro” (1-21) tyato ‘paro’tyanuvattetuṁ sakkāti
anya-e0806n1:59_9: tato pubbesaṁ pasaṅgoyeva natthīti, netadatthi, paroti tyanuvattamānaṁ ‘ato’ti pañcamyantena
anya-e0806n1:59_10: sambajjhamānaṁ na koci vāretā atthīti parato-kārato pubbesampi yonaṁ ṭāṭeādesā pappontīti
anya-e0806n1:59_12: kiṁ ‘narānare’ tyudāhaṭanti ce, nesadoso, aññadatthaṁ kārīyamānamihā-pyatthavantaṁ
anya-e0806n1:59_13: hotīti, pubbako parihāroti byava hitanivattiyā pubbasutte vutto “saretopasilesikādhāro”ti
anya-e0806n1:59_14: parihāro, na sambhavatīti iha sattamiyā abhāvā na sambhavati, vacanānantaranti pāṇiniyānaṁ
anya-e0806n1:59_17: Anantaretivacanā paccāsattiyā nissayanaṁ viññāyate, katatthatāyāti vacanā jātiyātyāha-
anya-e0806n1:59_18: ‘paccāsatyā jātiṁ sannissāyā’ti jātiṁ sannissāya paccāsatyā karaṇabhūtāya nivattimāheti
anya-e0806n1:59_20: jātipadatthoceha nissīyateti dasseti, na hi kevalaṁ jātiṁ nissāya byavahitanivatti
anya-e0806n1:59_21: vattuṁ sakkā, tathāhi yadettha paccāsattiñāyo na nissito, tadā byāpanañāyena byavahite
anya-e0806n1:59_22: cābyavahite cāsajjatīti jātiyā nissayane satyapi byavahitepi byāpyamānā jāti kena
anya-e0806n1:59_23: nivārīyate nāpi kevalaṁ paccāsattinnissāya byavahitanivatti vattuṁ sakkā, tathāhyasati
anya-e0806n1:59_24: jātisannissayena byattinissīyate, byattiyañca padatthe paṭilakkhiyaṁ lakkhaṇaṁ pavattatīti
anya-e0806n1:59_25: paccāsatti ñāyanissayanepyabyavahitampati yaṁ lakkhaṇaṁ bhinnaṁ tadabyavahite pavattaṁ,
anya-e0806n1:59_26: yampana byavahitampati bhinnaṁ lakkhaṇaṁ, tañca vacanappamāṇato mābhavatvassa byatthatāti
anya-e0806n1:59_27: byavahitepi pavattate, tasmā ubhopi nissāya nīyāti. Visayadassanappasaṅge visayidassanamatthabyattikāraṇanti
anya-e0806n1:59_29: jātilakkhaṇoti abyavahitattajātisabhāvo, ‘osadhyo’ti ettha sakāre akārā parassa dhakārena
anya-e0806n1:59_30: byavahitassa yossa viyāvasesānampi sabbhāvato vuttaṁ-‘yoppabhutīna’nti, jāti sāmaññaṁ,
anya-e0806n1:59_31: yāvati visayeti gavādike yattake visaye, kāmacārato visaya parisamattiyā diṭṭhantamāha-‘taṁ
anya-e0806n1:59_32: yathe’ti, bhojayetīti ettha bhojayeitīti padacchedo, katohi jātyattho kasiṇoti yasmā
anya-e0806n1:59_33: sakalo brāhmaṇa jātisaṅkhāto attho parisamatto, tasmāti attho, idaṁ vuttaṁ hoti-
anya-e0806n1:59_34: ‘yāva diṭṭhambhojaye’ti vutte vuttena (potthake) santāya sāmaññavutti brāhmaṇasaddappayogasāmatthiyā
anya-e0806n1:59_35: paccekambhojanakiriyā katā nāma hoti, yato kasiṇopi jātyattho parisamatto nāmāti.
anya-e0806n1:59_36: “Byañjane dīgharassā”ti (1-33) sutte byañjaneti sattamī pubbassa dīghādividhimhi
anya-e0806n1:59_37: caritattā “saramhā dve”ti (1-34) ettha saramhāti pañcamyaka tatthā, tato pañcamīniddesassa
anya-e0806n1:59_38: balīyattaṁ, tato “sattamiyaṁ pubbassa” “pañcamiyaṁ parassā”ti dvinnaṁ parassa samuṭṭhāpane
anya-e0806n1:59_39: ‘byañjane’ti sattamī parassa kāriya yogitāya atthato vibhattivipariṇāmena chaṭṭhībhāvena
anya-e0806n1:59_40: pariṇamatī… dvinnaṁ suttānaṁ vippaṭisedhe parassa balī yattāvāti etādisasāmatthiyasabbhāvato
anya-e0806n1:61_0: Kiñci antassa sampattanti yaṁ ṭānubandhamanekavaṇṇaṁ na hoti, taṁ “chaṭṭhiyantasse”
anya-e0806n1:61_2: ṭānubandhamanekavaṇṇañca kāriyaṁ sabbassa pattaṁ. Yadantabhāvikāriyaṁtyādinā vacanaphalamupadassento
anya-e0806n1:61_3: ‘chaṭṭhīyantasse’tīmassāpavādo yaṁ yogoti dasseti, tassāyama pavādo hotu ṭānubandhādikāriyaṁ
anya-e0806n1:61_9: dasasadde-ntassa pattopi tadapavādattā “ādissā”tiādibhūtassa dakārassa hotīti āha ‘dakārassaro’ti.
anya-e0806n1:63_1: pāṇininā-antassa padassa vākyassa vā mābhavī’ti, iha tvanatthakaṁ vaṇṇaggahaṇaṁ byavacchejjābhāvāti
anya-e0806n1:63_2: dassetumāha-‘so ce’ tyādi, nanu brahmassāti visesanatthena vattumicchito mahābrahmasaddo
anya-e0806n1:63_4: pappoti, tathā sati ‘na hi chaṭṭhī niddiṭṭhassa antaṁ padaṁ vākyaṁ vā sambhavatī’ti
anya-e0806n1:63_5: kasmā vuttanti, vuccate- na visesanatthenākkhepamattena mahābrahmasaddo chaṭṭhī niddiṭṭho
anya-e0806n1:63_6: nāma bhavatīti na brahmasaddassa sabbassādesappasaṅgo, mahābrahmasadde vā brahmasaddo
anya-e0806n1:65_4: vajjane nīvāraṇe, panayane vā vattateti apodyante ussaggalakkhaṇāni vajjīyante nīvārīyante
anya-e0806n1:65_6: suttassa apavādo antāpavādo, ussajjate nivattīyatyapavādenetyussaggo, ussaggāpavādakkamo
anya-e0806n1:67_1: bravīti, paccekamabhisambandhoti so ṭakārānubandho cādesotiādinā, kassa sabbassa
anya-e0806n1:67_3: anubadhyate payoge asuyyamānepi payojanavasenānusarīyatītyanubandho, upadese yevopalakkhiya
anya-e0806n1:69_1: ādyantasaddānaṁ niyatavayavavācittā avayavassa cāvayavināmantarenā sambhavato sāmatthiyāvayavī
anya-e0806n1:69_2: lakkhīyati, chaṭṭhiyātyanuvuttito vāvayavāvayavisambandhesā chaṭṭhī, tāya niddiṭṭhassātyayamattho
anya-e0806n1:69_4: na dosā bhavantīti, atoyevāti tadavayavācittatoyeva, taggahaṇeneti avayavaggahaṇena,
anya-e0806n1:69_5: katākatappasaṅgittāti otte katepi akatepi vukāgamassa pasaṅgato, bhūyattattā hi ottassa
anya-e0806n1:69_6: bhūggahaṇe sati katepi otte vukāgamena bhavitabbamakatepi tatova “katākatappa saṅgī
anya-e0806n1:69_7: yo vidhi sanicco”ti niccattā ottaṁ bādhitvā vukāgamo hoti, atha vukāgame pacchā tena
anya-e0806n1:71_0: Yadiniddhāraṇe chaṭṭhī antassāvisesitattā avisesena yato kutoci antato bānubandho
anya-e0806n1:71_1: paro siyā, na hi dutiyaṁ saraggahaṇamatthi, yenānto visesīyateccāha-‘niddhāraṇa’miccādi,
anya-e0806n1:71_3: rundhatītetthadhakārassā numitassa maṁ na hotīti dīpeti, samāna jātiyasseva loke
anya-e0806n1:71_4: niddhāraṇappatīti hoticcāha-‘tathā hi’ccādi, yathā’kaṇhā gāvīnaṁ sampannakhīratamā’ti
anya-e0806n1:71_5: vutte avisesitattepi kaṇhāya kaṇhāgāvīyeva patīyate, tathehāpi sarānaṁ majjhe antātyantattena
anya-e0806n1:71_6: niddhāriyamāno samānajātiyo saroyeva patīyate, tena sarānaṁ yevāntāparo bhavissatīti
anya-e0806n1:71_7: bhāvo, visesanattoti “ñilatasse”ti (5-163) sutte assāti vutte ayameveti niyamābhāvā
anya-e0806n1:71_8: yassakassaci akārassa ñippatti, tenāniṭṭhappattīti lānusaṅgisseva assāti lassa yaṁ
anya-e0806n1:71_9: visesanattaṁ taṁ attho payojanamassa “kattarilo”ti (5-18) lakārassāti visesanattho
anya-e0806n1:73_0: Paroti vattate, so cāññādhikyaiṭṭhādyanekatthopi idha iṭṭha vācī daṭṭhabbo, kammabyatihāreghaṇiti
anya-e0806n1:73_2: (5-44) sāmaññena vihitattā vippaṭisedhananti atthe ghaṇi vippaṭī sedho, tenāha-‘sāmaññe’ccādi,
anya-e0806n1:73_5: loke virodhavācittena pasiddhattamāha ‘tathā hi’ccādinā, kathampana pamāṇabhūtassācariyassa
anya-e0806n1:73_6: vacanesu aññamaññavirodho sambhavatīccāsaṅkiya ubhinnaṁ sāvakāsatte sati sambhavati
anya-e0806n1:73_8: aññamaññenānakkante apariggahiteti vuttaṁ hoti, anubhayatāginīti yo visayekadeso
anya-e0806n1:73_9: ubhayanna bhajate tasmiṁ anubhayabhāgini visayekadese, sāmaññavisayo dvinnaṁ vidhīnaṁ
anya-e0806n1:73_10: sādhāraṇo visayo, tattha pavattippasaṅge sati soca vippaṭisedho jāyatīti sambandho,
anya-e0806n1:73_11: iminā vippaṭisedhassa visayo pavattippasaṅgo visayavisayīnamabhedena sutte ‘vippaṭisedho’tivuttoti
anya-e0806n1:73_12: ‘dvinna’miccādinā vuttigantho racitoti dīpeti, paro hotī tividhidassitoti iminā yadi
anya-e0806n1:73_13: niyamo-bbhūpagato siyā, tadā ‘parovahotī’ti vadeyyāti dasseti, pāṇiniyā hi jātiyaṁ
anya-e0806n1:73_14: padatthe sakimeva lakkhaṇaṁ pavattatīti caritatthattā visayantare dvinnampi lakkhaṇānamappavattiyaṁ
anya-e0806n1:73_15: paraṁ pacchimaṁ kāriyanti vidhyatthamidaṁ vacanaṁ, byattiyantu padatthe latvādīnamiva
anya-e0806n1:73_16: pariyāyappasaṅge niyamatthanti paṭipannā, idha pana jātiyaṁ byattiyañca dvinnampi
anya-e0806n1:73_17: suttānamappavattiyameva vidhyatthamevidaṁ vacanaṁ, na niyamatthampīti paṭipādetumāha-‘tathāhi’ccādi,
anya-e0806n1:73_18: kāmacārato parisamāpīyateti sambandho, kāmato parisamāpanañcetissā sabbasmiṁ attano
anya-e0806n1:73_19: gocare avicchedabyāpanena pavattisabbhāvato. Kathampanekassāpi pavatti na bhaveyyātyāsaṅkiya
anya-e0806n1:73_21: tatoyeva pamāṇaṁ, abhimatakāriyavidhāne liṅgabhāvena saddikānumatattā(tesaṁ) vidhīnaṁ
anya-e0806n1:73_22: vidhāyakañca tasmāti attho. Pamāṇattā dvinnampi appattiyaṁ kāraṇamāha-‘anubhayabhāgimhi’ccādi,
anya-e0806n1:73_23: yato laddhāvakāsā tato samānabalāti, itisaddo hetumhi, viruddhācāti ettha itisaddaṁ
anya-e0806n1:73_24: datvā ‘anubhayabhāgimhi…pe… viruddhācāti dvinnaṁ vacanānaṁ pamāṇattā ubhinnampi appavattīti
anya-e0806n1:73_25: sambandho veditabbo. Samānabalānaṁ dvinnaṁ lokepi virodhittaṁ ekakkhaṇeyeva ubhinnampi
anya-e0806n1:73_26: kāriye appavatti ca dissatīti diṭṭhantamāha ‘lokece’tyādi, ettha ca pessassa (a)virodhatthino
anya-e0806n1:73_27: kāriye appavattiriva appavattiyeva (potthake) samānabalāna mubhinnaṁ vacanānaṁ kāriye
anya-e0806n1:74_1: vaṇṇito, tassāyuttattamupadassento āha ‘nacāpi’ccādi, bhinnavisayattāti dvinnaṁ vidhīnaṁ
anya-e0806n1:74_2: bhinnavisayattā. Abhinnavisayatte hi pariyāyakappanā yuttimatī, atoca latvādīnamabhinnavisayattampaṭipādayitumāha-
anya-e0806n1:74_4: sabbadhātupariggahena, yattha yasmiṁ dhātvatthekadese pavattā samānā pavattā santo
anya-e0806n1:74_5: laddhāvakāsā siyuṁ tassekadesassa parihārenāpi pariccāgenāpi na vidhīyanteti sambandho,
anya-e0806n1:74_6: latvādīna mekakkhaṇe asambhavā ekasmiṁ kate satītaravacanāna mānatthakyappasaṅgāca
anya-e0806n1:74_7: pariyāyena bhavantīti yantaṁ yuttanti sambandho. Ihāti imasmiṁ yugapadippattiyaṁ,
anya-e0806n1:74_8: iha tathābhāvassa kāraṇamāha-‘sāvakā…pe… vacana’nti, tatthāti yugapadippattiyaṁ.
anya-e0806n1:74_9: Jātiyampadatthe “punappasaṅgavijānanā siddhaṁ, vippaṭisedhe yaṁ bādhitaṁ tambādhitamevā”tīmāsamubhinnaṁ
anya-e0806n1:74_10: paribhāsanampavattiṁ paṭipādento āha- ‘parasmiṁ ce’tyādi, parasminti iṭṭhe, paribhāsanampana
anya-e0806n1:74_12: satiparamiṭṭhaṁ paṭhamaṁ hoti, hontena tena yadītarassa nimittopaghāto na kato tadā
anya-e0806n1:74_13: tassāpi punappasaṅgo tassa vijānanā siddhanti, vippaṭisedhe yathāvutte sati paṭhamaṁ
anya-e0806n1:74_14: hontena yaṁ suttaṁ bādhitaṁ tassa punappavattiyā yadi nimittaṁ natthi taṁ bādhitameve’ti.
anya-e0806n1:74_15: Byattiyampi vidhyatthamevidaṁ vacanaṁ, na niyamatthanti dassetumāha-‘byattiya’miccādi,
anya-e0806n1:74_16: evaṁ maññate ‘byattiyaṁ paṭilakkhiyaṁlakkhaṇappavattiyaṁ dvinnaṁ sādhāraṇaṁ ṭhānampati
anya-e0806n1:74_17: yāni vacanāni bhinnāni tesampi niravakāsattena tulyabalattā dvinnampaṭipattiyevasiyā,
anya-e0806n1:74_18: natu pariyāyappasaṅgo’ti. Byattiyampi yathāvuttānaṁ paribhāsānaṁ pavatti vuttavidhinevāti
anya-e0806n1:75_0: Jātiyampadatthe “vattamāneti anti, si tha, mi ma, te ante, se vhe, e mhe”ccādīnaṁ
anya-e0806n1:75_1: lakkhaṇānamekamekatthepi vattamāneti anti, vattamāne si tha iccādīnaṁ vākyekadesānaṁ
anya-e0806n1:75_2: gacchaticcādo gaccha siccādo ca lakkhiye sakimpavattiyā sabbasmiṁ sake visaye paṭhama
anya-e0806n1:75_3: majjhimapurisekavacanajāti parisamattāti caritatthattā tumhe gacchathāti ettha dvīhi
anya-e0806n1:75_4: dvinnaṁ purisāna mekakkhaṇe pavattiyaṁ na kassaci, byattiyampi paṭilakkhiyaṁ lakkhaṇāni
anya-e0806n1:75_5: bhijjantīti sādhāraṇaṁ ṭhānaṁ patibhinnehi lakkhaṇehi dvinnampekatthe-kakkhaṇe pavattiyaṁ
anya-e0806n1:75_6: na kassaci, tathā vuttanayeneva tiṇṇaṁ purisānamekakkhaṇe pavattiyanti sabbathā appavattiyaṁ
anya-e0806n1:75_7: sampattāyaṁ vacanamidaṁ, paro hotīti majjhimuttamaṁ bhavatīti adhippāyena ‘yathe’ccādinā
anya-e0806n1:75_9: manaṁ bhoseti-yato vippaṭisedhavisayamevedaṁ na hoti, kuto yato “vattamāneti anti”ccādippabhutīnaṁ
anya-e0806n1:75_10: vattamāneti anticcādīhi vākyekadesehi niddiṭṭhānameva pubbaparacchakkānaṁ purisavacanavisesavidhāyakena
anya-e0806n1:75_12: tīminā vākyāvayavena tumhāmhasesesu payujjamānesu appayujjamānesu vā yathākkamaṁ
anya-e0806n1:75_13: pubbacchakkānaṁ paracchakkānañca majjhimuttamapaṭhamānaṁ paccekaṁ dvedve vacanāni
anya-e0806n1:75_14: yathākkamaṁ bhavantīti ‘gacchatha gacchāmā’ti ettha ekakkhaṇe pavattiyeva natthi,
anya-e0806n1:75_15: dvinnampana sāvakāsāna mekakkhaṇe pavattiyeva hi vippaṭisedhoti, tathāpi vuttanayena
anya-e0806n1:75_16: vippaṭisedhappakappanāpi sakkā kātuntīdamudāhaṭaṁ siyāti daṭṭhabbaṁ, imissā pana
anya-e0806n1:75_17: paribhāsāya nirākulappavatti “ādissā” tīmissā vuttanayena veditabbā, katākatappasaṅgī
anya-e0806n1:75_18: yo vidhi, so nicco, yotvakateyevāyamaniccoti vuttaniccāniccesu antaraṅgabahiraṅgesu
anya-e0806n1:75_19: cātulyabalattā nāssa yogassa byāpāro, tathāhi niccāniccesu niccameva balavanti niccāniccānamatulyabalatā,
anya-e0806n1:77_1: saṅketo”ti sāmaññena vuttepi “bhāsissaṁ māgadhaṁ saddalakkhaṇa”nti saddalakkhaṇā
anya-e0806n1:77_3: lakāro udāharaṇaṁ, pakatiyādi samudāyassātiādivākyassa sāppāyamatthaṁ vivarituṁ ‘evamaññate’ccādi
anya-e0806n1:77_4: vuttaṁ, keci saddasatthakārāti pāṇiniṁ sandhāyāha, vacananti “tassa lopo”ti (1-3-9)
anya-e0806n1:77_5: vacanaṁ, payogāsamavāyitāti kattāiccādippayoge asamavāyitā appayogitāti adhippāyo,
anya-e0806n1:77_6: evampissa lopo vaseyo… anupubbo bandhivināsatthoti āhu uccāritapadhaṁsittā anubandhyate
anya-e0806n1:79_0: ‘Atenā’ti (2-108) ettha atoti rassabyattiniddeso vā siyā rassajātiniddeso vā sakalanissayabyāpī
anya-e0806n1:79_1: atthajāti niddesovā, tattha rassabyattiniddese sati buddhasiddhādīsu yatthakatthaci
anya-e0806n1:79_2: akāro gayhateti neṭṭhappasiddhi… kesañci asijjhanato, rassa jātiniddese pana buddhasiddhādisabbākārantānaṁ
anya-e0806n1:79_3: lakkhaṇikagavādyakā rantānañcākāro gayhatīti sabbathā iṭṭhappasiddhi, nāñño dīgho
anya-e0806n1:79_4: byattantarattāti nāniṭṭhappatti ākārato nāssenābhāvā, tasmā atoti rassajātiniddese
anya-e0806n1:79_5: nissite sabbamidamiṭṭhaṁ nipphajjatīti nātthajāti nissīyate, na rassabyattica, “yuvaṇṇāname
anya-e0806n1:79_6: oluttā”ti (1-29) ādīsu pana rassabyattiyā rassajātiyā vā niddese ‘tassedaṁ nopeti’ccādīsu
anya-e0806n1:79_7: eoādikamiṭṭhaṁ katthaci bhaveyya, na sabbattha, sabbattha vā bhaveyya ‘vāteritaṁ
anya-e0806n1:79_8: samonā’tiādīsu byattanta rattā, tasmā sabbathā iṭṭhappasiddhiyā ittajātyādi nissīyate,
anya-e0806n1:79_9: athavā vaṇṇuccāraṇampati kesañci vaṇṇuppattiṭṭhānānaṁ uccanīcatadubhaya saṁhāravasena
anya-e0806n1:79_10: vaṇṇavisesuppatti dassanato tesaṁ vasena rassa byattiniddese rassajātiniddese vā
anya-e0806n1:79_11: vuttanayena iṭṭhāniṭṭhappattiyaṁ sabbathā sabbathā iṭṭhappasiddhiyā ittajātyādi nissīyate,
anya-e0806n1:79_12: tattha vaṇṇa parena savaṇṇaggahaṇaṁ niyamituṁ vacanamidamāraddhanti ‘sabbatthevā’tiādinā
anya-e0806n1:79_13: vacanārambhaphalamāha, sabbatthevāti sabbasmiṁyeva suttappadese. Nanu sayañcāti vuttepi
anya-e0806n1:79_14: pariyattaṁ, na hyaññaṁ rūpā sayamatthi, aññaṁ vā (saya)to rūpanti siddhepyevaṁ sati
anya-e0806n1:79_15: atthettha paro koci visesoti ñāpetuṁ sañca rūpa’nti vuttikāro āhāti sambandho, rūpassa
anya-e0806n1:79_16: visesitabbattā ‘sañca rūpa’nti vuttiyaṁ niddisīyamānattā ca rūpanti viññāyatīti ‘sañca
anya-e0806n1:79_18: aññathāti aññenappakārena saṁrūpaggahaṇāya apisaddābhāveti adhippāyo, aññapadattheti
anya-e0806n1:79_19: aññapadattha samāsavisaye, guṇībhūtassāti appadhānabhūtassākāre kārādino, samāsena
anya-e0806n1:79_20: vuttattā padhānatū tattepi guṇo bhavati aññapadattho-kārekārādi vidhāya kattā, vidhīyamāno
anya-e0806n1:79_21: savaṇṇova padhānaṁ… idamatthitāya tappavattiyāti. Nanu vuttiyamapisaddassātthaṁ vadatā
anya-e0806n1:79_22: sayañceti vattabbaṁ, “tathā sayamattanī”ti nighaṇḍuto sayañca-ttākārekārādiñca gayhatītyamattho
anya-e0806n1:79_23: sambhāvīyatīti codanampanasi nidhāya ‘sañca rūpa’nti vadanto sādhippāyāruḷhaṁ kiñci
anya-e0806n1:79_25: saṁsaddo, tathāttattaniyesupī”ti nighaṇḍuvacanato ‘sa’nti attāpi gayhati, ko so saddarūpaṁ
anya-e0806n1:79_26: sādhāraṇaṁ, ‘sa’nti attaniyampi, kintaṁ saddāna masādhāraṇaṁ saddarūpaṁ, tathā sati
anya-e0806n1:79_28: rūpa’nti, etañca idantīminā sambandhitabbaṁ, asādhāraṇanti asādhāraṇaṁ saddarūpaṁ,
anya-e0806n1:79_29: sati sambhave byabhicāre ca visesanassa sātthakatāya asādhāraṇanti rūpaṁ visesatā
anya-e0806n1:79_30: sādhāraṇassāpi sambhavo vuttoyeva nāmāti āha-‘duvidhaṁ hi’ccādi, kintaṁ sādhāraṇamasādhāraṇañcarūpanti
anya-e0806n1:79_31: sāmaññena rūpaṁ niddisitumāha-‘tatthā’tiādi, tatthāti niddhāraṇe sattamī, saddānanti
anya-e0806n1:79_32: sātthakaniratthakānaṁ yesaṁkesañci saddānaṁ, taṁtaṁ saddattādīhi tesaṁtesaṁ buddha
anya-e0806n1:79_33: aiādīnaṁ saddānaṁ saddattādi, ubhayattha ādisaddena attho saṅgahito, tena sādhāraṇaṁ
anya-e0806n1:79_34: saddarūpamattharūpaṁ tathā-sādhāraṇanti catubbidhaṁ saṁrūpanti dasseti, catūsupi
anya-e0806n1:79_36: sādhāraṇarūpassa pariccāgena, upādiyanto rūpameva saddassasaṁ, nātthoti ca dassetīti
anya-e0806n1:79_37: sambandho, ca saddo panettha ‘idaṁ dassetī’ti heṭṭhā vuttaṁ samuccinoti, asādhāraṇassevopādiyane
anya-e0806n1:79_38: kāraṇamāha-‘tanta’miccādi, itaranti ye saṁkesañci saddānaṁ saddattādi, parassāpīti
anya-e0806n1:79_39: aññassa yassakassaci saddassāpi, iti idaṁ, patitaṁ pasiddhaṁ, ettha pana itisaddo
anya-e0806n1:79_40: hetumhi, yasmā idaṁ yathāvuttaṁ pasiddhaṁ tasmā pubbācariyaparamparāyāgato padesato
anya-e0806n1:79_43: vasenāti āha-‘saddasse’ccādi, āsannaṁ…saddato saddabhāvasā naññattā, vipariyayatoti
anya-e0806n1:79_44: vipariyāsena anāsanna bhāvenāti attho, cakkhuvisayopi hi attho kathaṁ sotavisayasaddassa
anya-e0806n1:79_46: apariccajanīyattā, idampi niccasambandhitte kāraṇavacanaṁ, taṁ saddarūpaṁ, niccasambandhīti
anya-e0806n1:79_47: nirantarasaṁyogī, vipariyayatoti heyyattā, tathāhiccādinā atthassa heyyattaṁ bodheti,
anya-e0806n1:79_48: aparaṁ kāraṇamāha-‘asādhāraṇañca rūpaṁ’tyādinā, sādhāraṇo pariyāya saddānaṁ, paccetabbattāti
anya-e0806n1:79_49: viññātabbattā, idāni kāraṇattayaṁ samodhānetvā imehi kāraṇehi rūpameva saddassa saṁnāma,
anya-e0806n1:79_50: nātthoti niyametvā dassetuṁ ‘tadeva’ntiādi āraddhaṁ, tadevanti yasmā evaṁ, taṁ tasmāti
anya-e0806n1:79_51: attho, sarūpappadhāneti “gossā vaṅa” (1-32) tyādo gossātyādike sarūpappadhāne.
anya-e0806n1:81_0: Ntusutiyā jantvādīnampi “ntantūnaṁnto yomhi paṭhame” (2-215) tyādinā gahaṇappasaṅge
anya-e0806n1:86_1: vinā ādhārantare gahite sati vacanantaraṁ suttantaraṁ vinā byavahitanivatti kātuṁ
anya-e0806n1:86_2: na ca sakkāti sambandho, kecīti buddhappiyācariyādayo dasseti, te hi yadi vaṇṇena
anya-e0806n1:86_3: kālena vā byavadhānepi sandhi bhaveyya tadā sareti nimittasso pādānaṁ niratthakaṁ
anya-e0806n1:86_4: bhaveyyāti sareti nimittopādānasāmatthiyenānena vaṇṇādibyavadhāne no sandhīti maññamānā
anya-e0806n1:86_5: ‘nimitto’ccādikaṁ vākyamāhu, tadayuttanti tehi’nimitto’ccādinā yaṁ vuttaṁ, taṁ ayuttanti
anya-e0806n1:86_6: attho, ayuttatte kāraṇaṁ byabhicārasabbhāvena sāmatthiyābhāvoyevāti byabhicārandassetvā
anya-e0806n1:86_8: saccaṁ, sumanā bhavantu athopi’tyādo vaṇṇakālabyavadhāneyeva, atha kho ‘ete na saccena
anya-e0806n1:86_9: suvatthi hotū’tyādo avasāne ‘pamādo maccuno padaṁ’ tyādo anta bindu saṅkhātanimittantare
anya-e0806n1:86_10: vā kāriyābhāvepi nimitto pādānassa sātthakatoti apisaddassattho, sātthakatoti bhāvappaccayalopena
anya-e0806n1:86_11: bhāvappadhānavasena vā vuttaṁ, sātthakattatoti vuttaṁ hoti, aññathā nimittopādānameva
anya-e0806n1:86_12: sātthakaṁ nāmāti ‘nimitto pādānassa sātthakato’ti na yujjati, ayametthādhippāyo ‘avasāne
anya-e0806n1:86_13: nimintare vā kāriyābhāvena byabhicārasabbhāvā aññathānupapattilakkhaṇaṁ sāmatthiyaṁ
anya-e0806n1:86_14: natthi, nimittantubyavadhānepi catthi, yathā’dārunimittaṁ vanopasaṅkamana’nti tasmā
anya-e0806n1:86_15: vaṇṇakālabyavadhānepi sareti nimitte sati lopakāriyaṁ pappote vā’ti. Luppatīti ‘tatrime’ccādinā
anya-e0806n1:86_16: kathanakāle na dissatīti attho, adassanamattameva hi lopo, aññathā ‘tatrā’disaddarūpābhāvappattiyā
anya-e0806n1:86_17: atthappatīti kārittamesaṁ na siyāti, paṭhamāya niddiṭṭho… vuttattā kammassa, sarassāti
anya-e0806n1:86_18: vadeyya… bhāve khādippaccayena avuttakammattā, ihāti iminā satthantare bhāvasādhanavasena
anya-e0806n1:86_19: gahaṇaṁ vibhāveti, gantha lāghavo… sarassa lopoti vā lopaṁ pappotīti vā avattabbattā,
anya-e0806n1:86_20: saroti paṭhamāya niddiṭṭhattā saro lopo nāma hotīti saṅkāpi siyāti āha-‘na ce’ccādi,
anya-e0806n1:86_21: ihāti imasmiṁ sutte, honticcādopi pubbasaralope hanticcādikampi siyātyāsaṅkiyāha-‘soce’ccādi,
anya-e0806n1:86_22: ussaggato āgato sambhūto tassa vā ayaṁti ossaggiko pubbalopo, tassa bhāvo ossaggikattaṁ,
anya-e0806n1:86_23: ossaggikattā pubbalopassa kāriyantarehi paralopādīhi apavādavidhīhi ābādhito eva,
anya-e0806n1:86_24: so ca pubbalopo hotīti sambandho, “paro kvacī”ti (91-27) kvaciggahaṇena pubbaparalopānaṁ
anya-e0806n1:86_25: tulyabalattābhāvā yathā gamappattito paralopassāpavādarūpattaṁ, ajjhāsiteti paviṭṭhe,
anya-e0806n1:86_26: na hoti… paralopāpavādena bādhitattā, tehīti paralopādīhi, sabbathā muttavisayo saddhindriyanti,
anya-e0806n1:88_0: Itisaddo idamatthe, kvaci lopanīyo hotīti idaṁ vacanaṁ dīpetīti sambandho, kinti
anya-e0806n1:88_1: āha-‘payogānusārita’nti, kassāti āha-‘kāriyassa paralopassā’ti, kena hetunāti āha
anya-e0806n1:88_2: ‘kvaciggahaṇenā’ti, katthāti āha-‘iha imasmiṁ sutte’ti, tenāti tena payogānusāritādīpanena,
anya-e0806n1:88_3: yathāpayoganti āgamapayogānatikkamena, niccaṁ pakkhevā paralopo siyāti honticcādo
anya-e0806n1:88_4: niccaṁ, latāvātiādīsu pakkhe vā paralopo bhaveyya, evaṁ maññate “kasminti atthe kvāti
anya-e0806n1:88_6: kvacisaddo-yaṁ yathāgamaṁ niccamaniccamasantañca vidhiṁ dīpeti, tattha honticcādiko
anya-e0806n1:88_7: nicca pakkho paralopasseva visayo, latāvātiādiko aniccapakkho ubhayasādhāraṇattā
anya-e0806n1:88_8: pubbalopassāpi visayoti iminā niccaṁ pakkhe vā paralopo hoti, asantapakkho pana saddhindriyantiādiko
anya-e0806n1:88_9: pubbalopasseva visayo sabbathānena pariccattattā”ti, tīsupi cetesu pana pakkhesu
anya-e0806n1:88_10: niccāniccapakkhesu yevassāpavādarūpatā… pubbalopassa sabbathā honticcādo nivārakattā
anya-e0806n1:88_11: vā vidhāyakattā vā paralopassa, na tvasantapakkhe… pubbalopasseva sabbathānena dinnā
anya-e0806n1:88_12: vasarattā, lokaggotiādi tu kvacisaddassa payogānusāritā dīpakattā nicce asantevāpi
anya-e0806n1:88_13: vidhimhi dīpite paralopena vā nipphajjatīti neṭṭhabyāghāto, evaṁ tāva kvaciggahaṇe
anya-e0806n1:88_14: sabbathāniṭṭhaparihārena iṭṭhappasiddhi siyā, tadabhāvekathanti tadabhāve virodhamāha-‘aññate’ccādi,
anya-e0806n1:88_15: pariyāyena bhavantīti kvaciggahaṇābhāve ‘paro’ti suttaṁ siyā tathā sati suttadvayamekavisayaṁ
anya-e0806n1:88_16: tulyabalañca siyā, tattha vippaṭisedhābhāvā pamāṇabhūtānamācariya (vacanā)naṁ niratthakatā
anya-e0806n1:88_17: mā bhavīti vārena bhavantīti attho, itīti iminā pariyāyabhavanakāraṇena, pakkheyeva
anya-e0806n1:88_18: siyāti latāvātiādīsu pubbalope pariyāyappavatte pariyāyena paralopassāppavattito
anya-e0806n1:88_19: latāvāti pakkheyeva paralopo bhaveyya, honticcādo niccaṁ na siyāti sambandho, tañcāti
anya-e0806n1:88_20: taṁ pariyāyabhavanañca, kho vākyālaṅkāre, paṭipadanti padampa dampati hoti, nekadesaparihārenāpi,
anya-e0806n1:88_21: tenāha ‘na katthacī’ti, iminā idaṁ dīpeti “sabbattha vikappappasattiyā hanti, saddhandriyaṁtyādikaṁ
anya-e0806n1:88_23: evamidaṁ yathāvuttaṁ vikappavidhānaṁ saddalakkhaṇaññūhi nevābhimatanti attho, tameva
anya-e0806n1:88_24: sādheti ‘paralopo hi’ccādinā, athā niccapakkhe vā paralope kate-nena pariccattaṭṭhāne
anya-e0806n1:88_25: ussaggappavattiyā latāva latevāti rūpadvayaṁ sampajjati tasmā payogānusāritādīpakena
anya-e0806n1:88_26: kvacisaddeneva honti saddhindriyaṁ latāva latevāti payoga sambhavopi, tathāpi aniccapakkhe
anya-e0806n1:88_27: latāivāti tatiyarūpappasiddhiyā pariyāyena bhavitabbanti parikappeti ‘nanu cetyādinā,
anya-e0806n1:88_28: atha “paro kvacī’ti kvaciggahaṇe sati apa(vādarūpa)ttā kathampariyāyappavattīti manasi
anya-e0806n1:88_29: nidhāyāniccapakkhe pariyāyappavattidīpanatthaṁ “na dvevā”ti suttitanti apavāde rūpattayepi
anya-e0806n1:88_31: sutteneva pariyāyassāpi dīpitattaṁ sādheti, sā ca ekatthappavatti pariyāyaṁ vinā
anya-e0806n1:88_32: na sambhavati… ekakkhaṇe pavatyasabbhāvāti adhippāyo, nanu ca kvacābhāve pariyāyappavattiyaṁ
anya-e0806n1:88_33: yathāvutta dosassevāppasaṅgato mā hotu pariyāyo, bhinnavisaye pana pubbaparalopappavattiyā
anya-e0806n1:88_34: “na dvevā’ti nisedhe lateva latāva latāivāti rūpattayaṁ nipphajjatīti codanaṁ manasi
anya-e0806n1:88_35: nidhāyāha-‘nace’ccādi, tattha dosamāha-‘tathā ca sati’ccādinā, katthaci demiccādo
anya-e0806n1:88_36: niccaṁ pubbalopasseva, katthaci honticcādo niccaṁ paralopasseva, vikappena vā katthaci
anya-e0806n1:88_37: yathodakaṁ yathāudakaṁ tyādo pubbalopasseva katthaci itipi iccapiccādo paralopasseva
anya-e0806n1:88_38: katthaci lateva latāva latāivāccādo pariyāyenubhayalopasseva dassanatoti sambandho,
anya-e0806n1:88_39: etthaca itipīti vavatthitavibhāsatta dīpanena kvacisaddena paralope kate-ññatra pubba
anya-e0806n1:88_40: lope sampatte “na dvevā”ti etthānuvattamāna kvacānubhāvena niccaṁ nisedhe iccapicceva
anya-e0806n1:88_41: bhavati. Sambajjhati tesu tesu suttesu. Paricchedoti kammatthavasena ādhāravasena
anya-e0806n1:90_0: Tatthacāti casaddena bhavitabbaṁ, tathā ca sati aññoññānajjhāsi taṁ yathodakaṁ yathāudakaṁtyādi
anya-e0806n1:90_1: itipi iccapiccādica saṅgahitaṁ bhavatīti, pubbalope paralope ca pariyāyena sampatte
anya-e0806n1:90_2: dvinnampi pakkhe abhāve sati kathamidaṁ yujjatīti codeti‘yajjeva’miccādinā, yajjevanti
anya-e0806n1:90_3: hi ayaṁ nipātasamudāyo aniṭṭhāpādanārambha vattate, evañce gayhatīti attho, tadeti
anya-e0806n1:90_4: atthato viññāyati, niccaṁ sandhikāriyābhāve kāraṇamāha-‘upasilesā bhāvato’ti, tadeva
anya-e0806n1:90_5: samattheti īdisesu hi’ccādinā, vattumiṭṭhattāti iminā sannikaṁso vaṇṇāna maddhamattakālabyavadhānā
anya-e0806n1:90_6: paccāsatti, sannikaṁsassetassa vacanicchāyaṁ satiyeva sandhikāriyaṁ hotīti dīpeti,
anya-e0806n1:90_7: upasilesābhāvo vāti upasilesābhāvo eva bhavati, nāññathāti adhippāyo, tadabhāvecāti
anya-e0806n1:90_8: tassa upasilesassa abhāve ca, sandhikāriyābhāve kāraṇamāha-‘kālantarena byavadhānā’ti,
anya-e0806n1:90_9: kālantarenāti ubhayattha ṭhitavaṇṇāna muccāraṇakālato aññena majjhappatitakālena,
anya-e0806n1:90_10: sandhi hoteva… sannikaṁsavacanicchāvasena upasilesabhāvato, buddha vīra atthurājaputtaṁ
anya-e0806n1:90_11: ajarāmaroti chedo, yadipi sabbampetaṁ yajjevaṁtyādinā vuttaṁ kvaci saddappabhāveneva
anya-e0806n1:90_12: sijjhati, tathāpi pakāro-yampi satthe yojetabbo vāti dassetuṁ vutto.
anya-e0806n1:92_0: Nanu sutte ‘luttā’ti pañcamī niddesā ‘paresa’nti hotu, ‘yathākkamaṁ’ti tu vacanābhāve
anya-e0806n1:92_1: kathaṁ yathākkamantīdaṁ vuttanti āha-‘same’ccāti, samā saṅkhyā gaṇanā yesu te samasaṅkhyā-uddesino
anya-e0806n1:92_2: anudesino ca, uddisanaṁ paṭhamaṁ niddisanaṁ uddeso, anudisanaṁ pacchā kathanaṁ anudeso,
anya-e0806n1:92_3: uddeso anudeso esamatthīti uddesino anudesino, tesaṁ samasaṅkhyānamuddesīnaṁ anudesīnañca,
anya-e0806n1:92_4: ivaṇṇuvaṇṇāhi uddesino dve, e okārā anudesino ca dveti uddesīnamanudesīnañca ṭhānyādesānaṁ
anya-e0806n1:92_5: samasaṅkhyā siyā, satiyañca tassaṁ yathākkama mādasā vidhīyante, lokato siddhimupadasseti
anya-e0806n1:92_6: ‘tathāhi’ccādinā. Ava…pe… e oti paresaṁ mataṁ, vippaṭipattīti viruddhā paṭipatti
anya-e0806n1:92_7: paṭijānanaṁ, pare “satipi heṭṭhā vāggahaṇe‘kvacāsavaṇṇaṁ lutte’ti sutte kvaciggahaṇakaraṇato
anya-e0806n1:92_8: avaṇṇe eva lutte asavaṇṇo vidhi hoti, tato idha na hoti diṭṭhupādāna”nti vadanti,
anya-e0806n1:92_9: kvacīti adhikāro idha na hoti mahussavo mātūpaṭṭhānanti, patisaddo ādhārattho, tena
anya-e0806n1:92_10: samānādhikaraṇo urasaddopīti urasminti nicca samāsattā asakapadena viggahe kate “asaṅkhyaṁ
anya-e0806n1:92_12: ettha pana yuvaṇṇānanti saṁsāmi samīpasamūha vikārāvayavādīsu ṭhānyādesasambandhe
anya-e0806n1:92_13: chaṭṭhī, tasmā ivaṇṇuvaṇṇānaṁ ṭhāne e oādesā hontīti attho, ṭhānampana tidhā apakaṁso
anya-e0806n1:92_14: nivatti pasaṅgo ceti, tattha gunnaṁ ṭhāne assā sambandhīyantu bajjhantu (jinindabuddhi)
anya-e0806n1:92_15: ti apakaṁso ṭhānasaddassattho, “semhassa ṭhāne kaṭukamosadhaṁ dātabba”nti nivatti
anya-e0806n1:92_16: “dabbhānaṁ ṭhāne sarehi attharitabba”nti pasaṅgo, tesu idha paṭhamadutiyā na yujjanti…
anya-e0806n1:92_17: niccattā saddatthasambandhassa apanayanavināsā na yujjantīti, tatiyo tu (yujjati)…
anya-e0806n1:92_18: sutte atthābhidhānāya ivaṇṇuvaṇṇānaṁ pavattippasaṅge tadatthābhidhānāyeva eoādesā bhavantīti.
anya-e0806n1:94_0: “Sattamiyaṁ pubbasse”ti (1-14) pubbassa kāriyavidhānato sattamī niddiṭṭhassa paratā
anya-e0806n1:94_1: viññāyatīti vuttiyaṁ ‘pare’ti vuttaṁ, evamuparipi, parehi iccassa ajjhiṇamutto’ti
anya-e0806n1:94_3: abbhakkhānanti abbhuggabho imināva siddhanti “abbho abhī”ti ca na vattabbaṁ, iti+assa
anya-e0806n1:94_4: iti ṭhite paralopoti dassanatthaṁ ‘iti assa paralopo’ti āha, anvagamātiādīsu niccaṁ.
anya-e0806n1:98_2: avavādese pubbasaralope dīgheca gavāssaṁ, gavacchanti niccaṁ. Idaṁ kathaṁ sijjhatīti
anya-e0806n1:98_3: sambandho, idanti yathariveccādikaṁ, kiṁ vinā sijjhatīti āha-‘evādissā’tiādi, evassa
anya-e0806n1:98_4: ādiekāro evādi, tassa, riādesamantarenāti sambandho, casaddo aṭṭhānappayutto, rassavidhānañcāti
anya-e0806n1:98_5: yojanīyo, katepi tasminti tasmiṁ sutte vihite ca, na sijjhatīti evādissa riādeso
anya-e0806n1:98_6: na katoti katvā vuttaṁ, bhusaṁ+evāti (pana) ṭhite mahāvuttinā evādissa iādese rūpasiddhi
anya-e0806n1:100_0: Rassadīghānanti sutte avutte kathaṁ rassadīghānanti labhati uddesinoti āha-‘dīghassā’tiādi,
anya-e0806n1:100_1: dīghassāti rassassāti ca ṭhānasambandhe chaṭṭhī, paccāsatyāti ṭhānaso paccāsatyā,
anya-e0806n1:100_2: idañca nissaya vasena vuttaṁ, nissayakaraṇameko satthāgato ñāyoti, idha niccaṁ-vītināmeti
anya-e0806n1:102_0: Ṭhānasambandheti ṭhiti ṭhānaṁ pasaṅgo, sambandhanaṁ-sambandho, ṭhānyādesabhāvalakkhaṇo
anya-e0806n1:102_1: ṭhāneyoganimittabhūto sambandho ṭhānasambandho tasmiṁ, dve rūpāni hontīti iminā na
anya-e0806n1:102_2: sarūpappadhānoti dassitaṁ hotīti sambandho, hetumāha-‘bahuvacananiddesā’ti, dve rūpānihontītyādi
anya-e0806n1:102_5: ekavacanameva ( ) (pana) (potthake) hotī”ti, iminā ca-tthappadhāno-yaṁ niddeso na
anya-e0806n1:102_6: sarūpappadhānoti dasseti, adhipatipaccayo adhipatippaccayoti aniccaṁ, idha na hoti
anya-e0806n1:102_7: idha modatīti, taṁ khaṇanti ettha ekaṅgavikalaṁ paccudāharaṇanti saramhā parattābhāvā na dvittaṁ.
anya-e0806n1:104_0: Tabbagge tatiyapaṭhamāti kasmā vuttaṁ catuttha (dutiya) saddehi vaggakkharesveva
anya-e0806n1:104_1: gayhamānesu tathā niddeso yutto, na hi catunnampūraṇo catuttho dvinnampūraṇo dutiyoti
anya-e0806n1:104_2: akkharāyeva vuccantīti āsaṅkiya ‘vināpī’tiādimāha, akkhare akkharavisaye catutthādi
anya-e0806n1:104_3: vohāro karīyamāno vaggaggahaṇaṁ vināpi vaggakkhareyeva ruḷho pasiddhoti sambandho,
anya-e0806n1:104_4: hetumhi itisaddo, yato evaṁ, tasmā kāraṇā ‘tabbagge tatiyapaṭhamā’ti vuttanti adhippāyo,
anya-e0806n1:104_5: tabbaggeti catutthadutiyā yasmiṁ, tasmiṁyeva vaggeti attho, paccāsattīti pati āpubbā
anya-e0806n1:104_7: yathāyogganti catutthakkhare catutthassa tatiyo dutiyakkhare dutiyassa paṭhamoti
anya-e0806n1:104_8: evaṁ yoggamanatikkamma, dhassa dabhāvoti imināva pubbassa dhassa dattamupalakkheti,
anya-e0806n1:104_9: tathā yasattheroti. Theroti ettha ekāro vaggakkharo na hotīti tasmiṁ tavaggadutiyakkharassa
anya-e0806n1:104_10: tassa to paṭhamo na hoti. Panthoti ettha tavagga dutiyakkharena thakārena tabbaggabhūte
anya-e0806n1:104_11: nakāre satīpi na so tabbaggadutiyakkharoti na tassa paṭhamo to, ettha nigghoso nighosotiādi
anya-e0806n1:106_0: Itisaddo-nukaraṇaṁ. Nipātassa pakativiyā-nukaraṇaṁ bhavati, anukaraṇañca dvidhā asādhusaddarūpaṁ
anya-e0806n1:106_1: sādhusaddarūpanti, tesu bhāravāhako koci tena pīḷito ‘aho bhāro’ti vattabbe sattivekallā
anya-e0806n1:106_2: ‘aho bāla’ iccāha, taṁsamīpavattī ‘kimayamāhe’ti kenaci puṭṭho samāno ‘aho bāla iccayamāhe’ti
anya-e0806n1:106_3: vadati, idhamasādhusaddarūpaṁ, itīti pana sādhusaddarūpaṁ, tasmā tato-nukāriyenātthena
anya-e0806n1:108_0: Nanu “vitisseve vā”ti (1-36) votyanuvattiya avaṇṇe eonaṁ vo hotīti ca sakkā viññātuṁ,
anya-e0806n1:108_1: tathā sati ‘avaṇṇe kvaci vo hotī”ti vattabbaṁ ‘ahoti vā’ti kasmā vuttanti codanamāsaṅkiyāha-‘okārassapi’ccādi,
anya-e0806n1:108_3: puna okāro ṭhānibhāvena niddisitabbo na siyāti adhippāyenāha, na nimittanti eonaṁ
anya-e0806n1:108_4: vakārādesatthaṁ avaṇṇo kāraṇaṁ na hotīti attho, aññathāti avaṇṇassa nimittatte, okāraṁ
anya-e0806n1:108_5: na paṭheyyāti sambandho, makārāgame’yāca kamāgate aggamakkhāyatī’ti, sve bhavanti
anya-e0806n1:108_6: viggayha tanappaccaye taddhitavuttiyaṁ vibhattiyā “ekatthatāyaṁ”ti (2-119) lope akārādese
anya-e0806n1:108_7: dīgheca syādimhi svātanaṁ dvitte hiyyattanaṁ. Svātanantiādīsu niccaṁ, idha nahoti
anya-e0806n1:110_0: Katha‘māgamo hotī’ti vuttaṁ yadi niggahītamāgamo siyā sutte āgamaggahaṇena vā bhavitabbaṁ
anya-e0806n1:110_1: ña-ma-kādya nubandhavisesena vā tyāsaṅkiyāha-‘asati pi’ccādi, āgamāvasāye kāraṇamāha-‘ādesattāyogā’ti,
anya-e0806n1:110_2: ādesattāyogo kathaṁ viññāyati ccāha-‘ṭhāniniddesābhāvato’ti, tathā sati āgaminiddesābhāvā
anya-e0806n1:110_3: āgamattampi na siyāti codeti ‘yajjeva’miccādinā, na-iti codanaṁ paṭikkhipitvā tassa
anya-e0806n1:110_4: āgamattameva sādhetumāha-‘tassā’tiādi, tassāti niggahītassa, rassānuppavattito rassasarameva
anya-e0806n1:110_5: anugantvā pavattito, ayamevattho vuttiyampi dassitoyevāti vattumāha-‘etadeve’ccādi,
anya-e0806n1:110_6: purimā jātīti visesanasamāsekate rasse ca bindvāgamo, paranimittassāniddiṭṭhattā
anya-e0806n1:110_7: bahusadde-ntassa bindvāgame bahuṁ, satipi payogānusārittadīpakassa kvacisaddassāpi
anya-e0806n1:110_8: vavatthitavibhāsatte vāsaddassāpi tādisattasseva paṭipādakatta sabhāvaṁ dassetuṁ
anya-e0806n1:110_10: anurodhena lakkhaṇappavattikā vibhāsā vavatthitavibhāsā, abhedena tu vādhikāro vavatthita
anya-e0806n1:110_11: vibhāsā, tassā bhāvo vavatthitavibhāsattaṁ, tasmā, idha na hoti idha modati, imasmiṁ
anya-e0806n1:110_12: ṭhāne āgamattappakāsako ṭhāninidde sābhāvā ādesattāyogasaṅkhāto kāraṇaviseso samattho,
anya-e0806n1:110_13: tassa bhāvo sāmatthiyaṁ-atthabala-maññathānupapattilakkhaṇaṁ, sacāti so āgamo ca.
anya-e0806n1:112_0: Lopasaddassa bhāvasādhanamattameva sādhetumāha-‘tene’ccādi, lopoti yadi kammasādhano
anya-e0806n1:112_1: siyā tadā tena samānādhikaraṇaṁ katvā upari “parasaro”ti suttamārabhīyeyyāti byatirekamāha
anya-e0806n1:114: Tvaṁsi tvamasīti vikappo, idha na hoti tāsāhaṁ.
anya-e0806n1:116_0: Nanu vaggevaggantoti ettakeyeva vutte yasmiṁ (kismi)ñci vaggakkhare pare binduno
anya-e0806n1:116_1: yokoci vagganto aniyamena bhaveyya tathā sati aniṭṭhampi siyātyāsaṅkiya paccāsattiṁ
anya-e0806n1:118_0: Nanu saddattā byabhicārittā evassa tāva saddo hotu, saṁyato, saṁhitoti saddekadesabhūtānampi
anya-e0806n1:118_1: sambhavā tepi gahe tabbā siyunti ‘yaevahi saddesu’ti yahīnampi kathaṁ saddavohāro
anya-e0806n1:120: Yasadde pubbasutteneva saṁssapyādese siddhe so ( ) (tassa) (potthake) ya kāramatteyeva pare saṁsseva (yathā) siyāti suttamidamāraddhaṁ.
anya-e0806n1:122_0: Ṭhāninamāsilissa gacchati pavattatīti āgamo nāma, ko-yamettha ṭhānīti āha-‘sarassāti,
anya-e0806n1:122_1: sutte anuvattassa ca avijjamānattā ‘sarassā’ti kuto labbhatīti codeti ‘nanu ce’tyādinā.
anya-e0806n1:122_2: Āgamasutiyā vanādīnaṁ ṭhānisutiyā abhāvepi sāmatthiyā byañjanassa vā āgamo siyā sarassa
anya-e0806n1:122_3: vā, yadi byañjanassa vā siyā (na) “padādīnaṁ kvacī”ti (5-92) suttita mācariyena,
anya-e0806n1:122_4: tasmā tadeva ñāpeti ‘saro yevettha ṭhānī bhavitumarahatī’ti. Vuccateccādinā parihāramāha,
anya-e0806n1:122_6: (1-48) ye dassa jo “vaggala sehite”ti (1-49) (yassa jo) nipajjanaṁ, mānantatyādīsūti
anya-e0806n1:122_8: adhikārā, paccayantareti mānantatyādīto aññasmiṁ paccaye, kaccāyanena ‘atippagokhotāvā’ti
anya-e0806n1:122_9: sādhanatthaṁ “kvaci o byañjane”ti okārāgamo gakārāgamo ca suttantarena vihito, taṁ
anya-e0806n1:122_10: pakārantarena sādhetuṁ vuttiyaṁ-‘atippago kho tāvā’ti yaṁ vuttaṁ taṁ dassetuṁ ‘atippā’tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0806n1:124_0: Dvādayo aṭṭhārasantā bahuvacanantāti ‘chakī’ti vattabbe ‘chā’ti ekavacanaṁ na yujjatīti
anya-e0806n1:124_1: codeti ‘nanucā’tiādinā, pariharati naccādinā, neti ‘chaḷo’ti ayutto-yaṁ niddeso na
anya-e0806n1:124_2: hotīti attho, chasaddassa anukaraṇattā chasaddānukaraṇattā, heṭṭhā vuttasādhusaddarūpā
anya-e0806n1:124_4: attho vidhinisedharūpo yassa taṁ pariccattattaṁ, ettha pana chasaddena chasaṅkhyāviseso
anya-e0806n1:124_5: pariccatto, abhidhāyato hotīti iminā chasaddassa anukāriyenātthenātthavantatthamāha,
anya-e0806n1:124_6: ekavacanantassa niddeso kato… chasaddavacanīyassa chassa ekattā, anukāriyassāti ekādino
anya-e0806n1:124_7: saṅkhyā saddassa tadaññassa vā yadanukāriyamekādikaṁ tadaññaṁ vā saddarūpaṁ tassa.
anya-e0806n1:124_8: Saṅkhyādivisesanti ekattādisaṅkhyāvisesaṁ tadaññaṁ vā, “yomhi dvinnaṁ duve dve”ti
anya-e0806n1:124_10: tabbācakaṁ dvinnanti bahuvacanaṁ, atha ‘ḷañi’ti kasmā na vuttaṁ evañhi sati ñānabandhattāḷakāro
anya-e0806n1:124_12: vidhīyamāno ḷakāro cha saddā parassādissa āgamattā…pe… hotīti sambandho, antāpavādenāti
anya-e0806n1:124_15: iminā ḷassekavaṇṇattā antāpavādena “ādissā”ti sutte na ādyanto viyekopi saroti sarassādissa
anya-e0806n1:124_17: parassa sampattaṁ kāriyaṁ ekavaṇṇattā “chaṭṭhiyantassā”ti (1-17) antassa sampattaṁ
anya-e0806n1:124_18: “ādissā”ti (1-16) ādivaṇṇassa pappotī”ti. Ādibhūtova hotīti asatipi ñakāre āgamaggahaṇānuvattiyā
anya-e0806n1:124_19: āgaminaṁ saraṁ avināsento tassa ādyavayavabhūtova hotīti attho, lakāraṁ karonti “yavamadanataralācāgamā”ti
anya-e0806n1:124_20: suttena, tanti lakārakaraṇaṁ ubhinnamavisesavacanañca ayuttataṁ dasseti ‘tesampi’ccādinā,
anya-e0806n1:124_22: saññāyaṁ. Avisese laḷānaṁ nānattābhāve, pākaṭo vāti iminā sutilipibhedassa paccakkhasiddhatandasseti,
anya-e0806n1:124_23: tattha hi sotaviññāṇavīthiyā laḷānaṁ visuṁvisuṁ gahaṇaṁ suti, taṁtaṁ desavāsīnaṁ
anya-e0806n1:124_24: lekhā va vatthānaṁ lipi, tesaṁ bhedo sotacakkhuviññāṇagayhattā paccakkhasiddho, chaḷabhiññāti
anya-e0806n1:126_0: Issa attaṁ nipātanā, dakāro pana “mayadā sare”ti (1-44), padantarenātiādīti iminā
anya-e0806n1:126_1: aññena padena, sādhūni bhavantīti vutti pāṭhassa atthaṁ vattuṁ ‘sādhūni bhavantīti
anya-e0806n1:126_2: nipātanato’ti āha, tattha kāraṇamāha-‘ya’miccādi, appattassa pāpanampattassa paṭisedho
anya-e0806n1:126_3: ca nipātanaṁ, tesaṁ idha pāṭhāti tesaṁ tathā icchantānaṁ idhāti nipātassa imasmiṁ
anya-e0806n1:126_4: tadaminādisutte pāṭhā, uddhassa udūti uddhaṁ khamassāti aññapadatthasamāse uddhaṁkha
anya-e0806n1:126_5: iti ṭhite uddhaṁsaddassa uduādeso, asa-bhojane iccasmā “kvacaṇa’ iti (5-41) suttena
anya-e0806n1:126_6: aṇpaccaye asasaddo nipphajjatīti āha-‘pisitamasanā’ti “kvacaṇa” iti mahiyaṁ ravatīti
anya-e0806n1:126_7: ṭhite imināva gaṇanipātanena samāse kate mayūrasaddo nipphajjatīti dassetumāha ‘mahisaddasse’ccādi,
anya-e0806n1:126_8: assa tadaminādigaṇassa āgatigaṇattā evamaññepīti sambandho, vuttanti pāṭhaseso. Dīghanikāyādīsu pañcasu nikāyesūti–
anya-e0806n1:129_0: Vuttesu dīghāgamādīsu pañcasu nikāyesu, ñātabbāti vaṇṇā gamādidvārena jānitabbā,
anya-e0806n1:129_1: pañcavidhaṁ pañcappakāraṁ niruttamuccateti sambandho, nibbacanaṁ niruttaṁ, napuṁsake
anya-e0806n1:129_2: bhāve tto, atthakathanavākya pubbakamuccāraṇamiccattho, tadabhidhāyi satthamapyabhidhāne-bhidheyyo
anya-e0806n1:129_3: pacārā tadatthatāya vā niruttamuccate, vuttanirutti lakkhaṇena…pe… veditabbāti iminā
anya-e0806n1:129_4: niruttasatthe ye saddā paṭipadaṁ nipphādiyanti tesamidaṁ sāmaññena nipphādananti
anya-e0806n1:129_5: dīpeti, dvāre niyutto dovārikoti ettha ṇike dakāravakārānaṁ majjhe okārāgamo, hiṁsismāti
anya-e0806n1:129_7: nijakoti ettha jakārassa yakāre niyako. Atha vaṇṇavikāroti vuttattā javaṇṇassa yādese
anya-e0806n1:129_8: niyakādayo tāva sijjhantu, susānādayo kathaṁ chavapadādivikārattā susānādīnanti āha
anya-e0806n1:129_10: nirutta’nti saṅkhyāniyamo na yujjeyyāti bhāvo. Yogo sambandho, tathāhiccādinā dhātussa
anya-e0806n1:129_12: Mayūroti ettha ravati mayūrarāve eva vattate, na sāmaññena ravanakiriyāmatteti bhāvo.
anya-e0806n1:131_0: Vaṇṇamattasse vāti vaṇṇasāmaññasseva, mattasaddo ettha sāmañña vacano. Yakārassaca
anya-e0806n1:131_1: cādesoti sambandho, dayakārānaṁ jattantissa iminā, yassa “vaggalasehi te”ti (1-49)
anya-e0806n1:133_0: Yantaṁ saddānaṁ niccasambandhittepi pakkantavisayattā taṁsaddo yaṁsaddaṁ nāpekkhatetyāha-‘teti
anya-e0806n1:133_1: anantara’iccādi, taṁ saddo hi pakkanta visayo tathā pasiddhavisayo anubhūtavisayo
anya-e0806n1:133_2: ca yaṁsaddaṁ nāpekkhate, yathā ceso yaṁsaddannā pekkhate, taṁ sabbaṁ mahāsāminādhikāyaṁ
anya-e0806n1:136: Etissā gāthāya amhehi vitthāritanayena gahetabbaṁ, yathā rahanti sakammākammadhātūnamanurūpaṁ.
anya-e0806n1:138_0: Kiñcāpīdaṁ idaṁkiñcāpi (potthake) vikappanatthaṁ katanti heṭṭhimena ni(nnāna)ttaṁ
anya-e0806n1:138_1: viññāyati, tathāpi iminā vākārena vikappova, heṭṭhime pana kvacādhikārā hakārantadhātuto
anya-e0806n1:138_2: dhyaṇpaccaye mehyaṁ, dohyaṁ sinehyaṁ, lehyantipi bhavatveva.
anya-e0806n1:140_1: ādiyatītyādīti kammasā dhanocāyamādisaddo, soyamattho sumaṅgalappasādaniyā khuddasikkhā
anya-e0806n1:140_2: ṭīkāya‘ādito upasampannā’ti ettha amhehi vuttanayena veditabbo, saṁyujjatīti saṁyogo-ekatrāvaṭṭhitabyañjanā.
anya-e0806n1:142_0: Yaṁvattateti vuttivacanaṁ nikkhipitvā tassa atthaṁ vattumārabhate ‘sambhavāpekkhāye’ccādi,
anya-e0806n1:142_1: yaṁvattateti ca sutte avijjamānepi gammamānatthassa saddassa payogampati kāmacāroti
anya-e0806n1:142_2: vuttiyaṁ vuttaṁ, yasaddassāniyamatthavuttittepi padavākyato nāññaṁ sambhavati vicchāyamābhikkhaññe
anya-e0806n1:142_3: ca vattamānanti āha ‘sambhavāpekkhāyapadaṁ vākyaṁvā’ti, sambhavatīti sambhavo-padaṁ
anya-e0806n1:142_4: vākyaṁ vā, tasmiṁ apekkhāya padaṁ vākyaṁ vā vattateti sambandho, vattateti vicchāyamābhiññe
anya-e0806n1:142_5: cātthe vattate, nanu padassa vākyassa vā visuṁyeva dabbādayo atthā, taṁ kathamida
anya-e0806n1:142_6: metasmiṁ vattudhamme kiriyādhamme ca vicchābhikkhaññatthe vattateti anuyogaṁ sandhāyāha-‘visayabhāvenā’tiādi,
anya-e0806n1:142_7: vicchāya vattudhammassa kiriyādhammassa cābhikkhaññassa visayo padaṁ vākyaṁ vā… anaññatthavuttivasena
anya-e0806n1:142_8: tatthappavattiyā, taṁ vasenaca, abhidhāyakattena ceti gocarattena pakāsakattena cāti
anya-e0806n1:142_9: attho, yaṁvattateti ajjhāhaṭassa yanti paṭhamantassa vibhattivipariṇāmaṁ dasseti
anya-e0806n1:142_10: (tassāti) ādinā, iminā idaṁ dīpeti “yajjapi ‘vicchābhikkhaññesvi’ tyatra chaṭṭhīnoccārīyate,
anya-e0806n1:142_11: tathāpi chaṭṭhīpasiddhi hoteva, kathaṁ dve iccādesaniddesā ādeso ca sambandhīnamapekkhate,
anya-e0806n1:142_12: ‘vicchābhikkhaññesū’ti cātthaniddeso, na cātthassādesena sambandho upapajjate, tasmā
anya-e0806n1:142_13: vicchābhikkhaññesu yaṁ padaṁ vākyaṁ vā vattate tassa dve bhavanticcevaṁ chaṭṭhīyattho
anya-e0806n1:142_14: sakkā vattu”nti, dve rūpāni hontīti dassitaṁ hotīti sambandho, saddarūpe saṅkhyayyeti
anya-e0806n1:142_15: dutiyā bahuvacanantaṁ paṭipādayamānoti ettha paṭipādanakiriyāya sambandhenopadiṭṭhaṁ,
anya-e0806n1:142_16: “vākyantaraṭṭhopi saddo tadaññasmimpi sambandhamupayātī”ti dvisaddoti idaṁ upari
anya-e0806n1:142_17: vākyadvayepyupayujjati ‘dvisaddo vutto, dvisaddo na sarūpappadhāno’ti, atha sarūpappadhāno
anya-e0806n1:142_18: kasmā na vuttoti āha-‘bahuvacanena niddesā’ti, atha dveti sāmaññena vuttattā padavākyānaṁ
anya-e0806n1:142_19: ṭhāne dvibbacanaṁ vā siyā, tānevā vattantīti dvippayogo vā, tathā sati ‘yaṁvattate
anya-e0806n1:142_20: tassā’ti kasmā paṭhamameva nissāya vuttiyaṁ vivaraṇaṁ katanti āha-‘evañcā’tiādi,
anya-e0806n1:142_21: idāni dvippayogapakkhassa sadosattā agahitabhāvaṁ dassetumāha-‘yadātvi’ tyādi, tusaddo
anya-e0806n1:142_22: pubbasmā pakkhā visesassa padassako visesanattho (potthake), tattha hi dve dverūpa
anya-e0806n1:142_23: (potthake) saddarūpānyādisīyante, iha tu sova saddo dvirāvattate, āvuttī saṅkhyeyyāti
anya-e0806n1:142_24: evaṁ maññate “dvisaddo-yaṁ “ādasahi saṅkhyā saṅkhyeyye vattante”ti vacanato saṅkhyeyyavacano,
anya-e0806n1:142_25: tasmeha saṅkhyeyyaṁ saddarūpaṁ vā siyā āvutti vā, iccapi niddeso tadubhayamapekkhiya
anya-e0806n1:142_26: napuṁsakaliṅgena vā siyā itthiliṅgena vā, tattha yadā napuṁsakaliṅgena niddeso, tadā
anya-e0806n1:142_27: saddarūpāni saṅkhyeyyāni bhavanti, yadā tu itthiliṅgena, tadā saddassāvuttī uccāraṇalakkhaṇā
anya-e0806n1:142_28: kiriyā saṅkhyeyā bhavanti, tato cettha āvuttīapi saṅkhyeyā hontī”ti, tadā dvippayogo
anya-e0806n1:142_29: dvibbavacananti esa pakkhoti ayamettha bhāvo” yadā dve āvuttiyo vidhīyante tadā dvippayogo
anya-e0806n1:142_30: dvibbacanante sopekkho, (atra ṭhānyādesabhāvo natthi) natuṭṭhāne dvibbacanapakkho
anya-e0806n1:142_31: (potthake) āvutti hi kiriyā, tassā ceha saddo sādhanaṁ, na ca kiriyāya sādhanassa
anya-e0806n1:142_32: ca ṭhānyādesabhāvo upapajjate, tasmā yadāvuttī vidhīyante, tadā dippayogo dvibbacanante-so
anya-e0806n1:142_33: pakkho bhavatī”ti, ayampi pakkho pāṇinīyehi pariggahīto, tadayuttaṁ dosaduṭṭhattāti
anya-e0806n1:142_34: sandassayamāha-‘so pane’tyādi, te hi dutiyampi pakkhamabbhupagamma upacāramattato
anya-e0806n1:142_35: bhedo, vatthutotvabhedo vāti ponopuññena taṁ sādhenti. Kathampana sadosattaṁ yenāyaṁ
anya-e0806n1:142_36: na gahitotyāha- ‘tathāhi’ccādi, ṇyo nasiyāti “tassa bhāvakammesu tta tā ttana ṇya
anya-e0806n1:142_37: ṇeyya ṇiya ṇiyā”ti (4-59) bhāve vidhīyamāno ṇyo dvippayogapakkhe saddabhedasabbhāvā
anya-e0806n1:142_38: puna puneti samudāyasabhāvato punapuna bhāvoti atthe punapuna samudāyato na bhaveyyāti
anya-e0806n1:142_39: attho, na kevalaṁ ṇyova, atha kho ekapadantogadhānaṁ sarānaṁ sarānamādibhūtassukārassa
anya-e0806n1:142_40: bhavanto okāropi “sarānamādissā yuvaṇṇassā eo ṇānubandhe”ti (4-124) na siyā, “manādyāpādīnamomaye
anya-e0806n1:142_41: ca “iti (3-59) okāro pana pakkhadvayepi hoteva… uttarapadassa nimittabhāvena gahitattā,
anya-e0806n1:142_42: pubbapakkhepi hi dve saddarūpānyevādisīyanteti hoteva pada bhedo, vakkhati hi ‘satīpi
anya-e0806n1:142_43: attagate bhede’ti. Nanu āvuttidhammabheda saddassupacarito bhedo, sarūpato tvabhedova,
anya-e0806n1:142_44: aññathā āvuttiyeva na siyā, ekassa hi vatthuno āvutti hoticcāha‘nāntarene’ccādi,
anya-e0806n1:142_45: aññatheti upacarito bhedo na sabhāvatoti ce, kāriyambhavatīti evi na sakkā vattunti
anya-e0806n1:142_46: sambandho, sabhāvato tvabhedo vāti upacārābhāvena vatthuto vijjamānabhedamavadhārayati,
anya-e0806n1:142_47: aññathāti yadi bhedo siyā, āvuttiyeva na siyāti etthāyamadhippāyo “yadi sabhāvatova
anya-e0806n1:142_48: bhedo bhinnassa pana kathamāvutti siyā”ti, ṭhānisadisattāti “ṭhānīviyādeso”ti paribhāsamupalakkheti.
anya-e0806n1:143_0: Kiriyāyātiādīsu sahatthe tatiyā… kiriyādīhi dabbādyatthānaṁ vattu kattu byāpanicchāpavattito,
anya-e0806n1:143_2: bhinnaṁ nāma hotīti āha-‘anekappakārayutte’ti, bahuvacananiddesato vuttaṁ hotīti
anya-e0806n1:143_3: sambandho, tenāti yena bahuvacananiddesena sakiṁ byāpanicchā jotīyati tena karaṇabhūtena
anya-e0806n1:143_4: hetubhūtena vā, kamena byāpitumicchāyaṁ jātiādīnañca byāpitumicchāyanti sambandho,
anya-e0806n1:143_5: tattha ayañca gāmo ramaṇīyo ayañca gāmo ramaṇīyoti kamena byāpitumicchā, ettha kiñcāpi
anya-e0806n1:143_6: ramaṇīyaguṇena gāmadabbayogo atthi, tathāpi gāmānaṁ guṇena yogo, sabbo gāmo ramaṇīyoti
anya-e0806n1:143_7: bāhullena, natthi sākallena kamena (potthake) byāpitumiṭṭhattanti sakalabyāpanicchāyābhāvoti
anya-e0806n1:143_8: na dvibbacanaṁ, evamupari yojetvā attho daṭṭhabbo, sampanno yavoti sampannaguṇena
anya-e0806n1:143_9: yavajātiyā byāpitumicchā, ekatthā jāti, anekattha nissayā vicchā ekatthājāti, ekamatthaṁ
anya-e0806n1:143_10: ñāpayissāmīti jātisaddo payujjate ane katthanissayāca vicchā, anekatthaṁ saññāpayissāmīti
anya-e0806n1:143_11: vicchāpayujjate-ti mahābhasse, sobhanaṁ dhavakhadiranti sobhanaguṇena dhavādidabbānaṁ
anya-e0806n1:143_13: visaddo panettha byāpanatthoti āha-‘byāpituṁ sambandhitu’nti, sāti vicchā, vattudhammoti
anya-e0806n1:143_14: ‘rukkhaṁrukkha’miccādikaṁ yo vadati, tassa vattuno dhammo… icchālakkhaṇassa dhammassa
anya-e0806n1:143_15: tappaṭibaddhattā, saddoti rukkhamiccādiko, tassa saddassa yaṁ rūpaṁ atta bhāvo, tameva
anya-e0806n1:143_16: paccāsatyā “sutānumitesu sutasambandhova balavā”ti vicchā bhikkhaññesu vattamānassa
anya-e0806n1:143_17: sutasseva tassa rūpassa paccāsannabhāvato dvisaṅkhyā yuttaṁ dvisaṅkhātāya saṅkhyāya
anya-e0806n1:143_18: ‘rukkhaṁ rukkha’miccevaṁ yuttaṁ atidisīyate sutte dveiccanena, dvibbacanasseva dvibbacanameva
anya-e0806n1:143_19: (potthake) hi dvisaṅkhyāyuttatā, atha katamekavacanantassa dvibbacanaṁ, tathāhi sabbeyevetettha
anya-e0806n1:143_20: vicchāyaṁ dvittehyabhidhayanteti bahattā bahuvacanaṁ pappoti, ekavacanantu na sijjhati
anya-e0806n1:143_23: vakkhamānanayena bahuvacanantappayogeneva vicchātthajotanato na tattha dvībbacanaṁ
anya-e0806n1:143_24: siyā, bhavitabbañca dvibbacane (na, e) kavacanattamantarena na cātthi dvibbacanāvakā
anya-e0806n1:143_25: soti patīti balāvagato yo-ttho, tassa atthassa aññathānupapattilakkhaṇaṁ sāmatthiyaṁ
anya-e0806n1:143_26: atthasāmatthiyaṁ, atthasāmatthiyā ekavacanantassa dvībbacananti sambandhā, kiriyādiyoganti
anya-e0806n1:143_27: kiriyāguṇādi sambandho, mantvāti byāpitumicchāyantīmassa pubbakiriyāvacanaṁ, abhisaṁharitvāti
anya-e0806n1:143_28: ekatokatvā. Saddassa tādisatthapaccāyakatte sāmatthiyaṁ saddasatti saddassa. Yugapadādhikaraṇatāyaṁ
anya-e0806n1:143_29: sahavacanicchāyaṁ bahuvacanappavattiyeva, na tattha dvibbacananti dassetumāha-‘atoyeve’ccādi,
anya-e0806n1:143_30: ato yevāti bahuvacanantassa saddasattiyā vicchājotanato dvibbacanābhāvāyeva, evamaññate-
anya-e0806n1:143_31: ‘idha pana yogapajjaṁ duvidhaṁ saddayogapajjaṁ atthayogapajjañca, tattha kiñci sātthakānaṁ
anya-e0806n1:143_32: saddayogapajjamatthayoga pajjaṁ na sambhavatīti, yugapadi adhikaraṇaṁ dhavādi attho
anya-e0806n1:143_33: yassa sodhavakhadirapalāsasaddo yugapadādhikaraṇo, tassa bhāvo tathā, tassañca sati,
anya-e0806n1:143_35: taṁ sahavacanicchāyanti iminā dassitanti tassaṁ sahavacanicchāyañca sati, sobhanā
anya-e0806n1:143_36: dhavakhadirapalāsā sobhanā rukkhāti sobhanaguṇayogepi bahuvacaneneva vicchājotanato
anya-e0806n1:143_37: dvibbacanābhāvoti, sobhanaṁ dhavakhadiranti pana satīpi saddayogapajje samāhārattā
anya-e0806n1:143_39: sobhanaṁ dhavakhadiranti saddānaṁ sakiṁ byāpanicchāyābhāvā na dvibbacananti heṭṭhā vuttaṁ.
anya-e0806n1:144_0: Vāttikakārena “ānupubbiye dve bhavantīti vattabba”nti (8-1-1-vā) vuttaṁ, tadāha-‘ānupubbiyepi’ccādinā,
anya-e0806n1:144_2: vuttivākyassa vivaraṇamāha. Gāmajātiyā tulyajātiyānaṁ disā desādibhedena bhinnānamiva
anya-e0806n1:144_3: gāmānaṁ, na ettha vicchā, mūlamaggaṁ vā hi mukhya mekameva… heṭṭhuddhabhāgantarābhāvenekattā,
anya-e0806n1:144_4: yenupariyadho bhāgāpekkhāya katamūlaggabyapadesena bhinnajātiyā mūlaggabhāgā, te
anya-e0806n1:144_5: bhinnajātiyā, na ca bhinnajātiyānaṁ vicchā hoti, na hi gogoti vutte (vāhīka)gatā
anya-e0806n1:144_6: vicchāvagamyateti ācariyajinindabuddhinā ānupubbiye vicchāyābhāvaṁ paṭipāditaṁ, taṁ
anya-e0806n1:144_7: vighaṭayituṁ ‘yadi hi’ccādinā yaṁ vuttiyaṁ vuttaṁ, taṁ vipañcitumāha- ‘yathe’ccādi,
anya-e0806n1:144_8: nasanniviṭṭhoti na patiṭṭhito, natthīti vuttaṁ hoti, yassūparibhāgo atthi tampi mūlanti
anya-e0806n1:144_9: mūla byapadesassāpekkhā katattamāha, ubhayanti mūlamaggañca, tathā aññepi mūlaggabhāgāti
anya-e0806n1:144_10: iminā mūlaggabhedānaṁ heṭṭhā viya gahaṇe sati bahuttamāha, pubbakathitenāti ‘rukkhādīnaṁ
anya-e0806n1:144_11: bāhullenā’tiādinā pubbe vuttanayena, idaṁ vuttaṁ hoti “mūlādīnaṁ bāhullena thūlādi
anya-e0806n1:144_12: guṇayogammantvā sattamīvibhattiyuttena mūlādisaddasahitena sabba saddena mūlādikamatthamabhisaṁharitvā
anya-e0806n1:144_13: sabbasmiṁ mūle thūlā sabbasmiṁ agge sukhumāti evaṁ (vattuno) byāpitumicchāyamekavacanantassa
anya-e0806n1:145_0: Jeṭṭhānaṁ vicchāsambhave sabbakaniṭṭhassa jeṭṭhattābhāvānuppaveso na siyāti ānupubbiyamattavacanicchāyaṁ
anya-e0806n1:145_2: vighaṭīyati ‘jeṭṭha’ miccādinā, kaniṭṭhopi pavesīyatīti kaniṭṭhassapi vicchāsambhavamāha,
anya-e0806n1:145_3: tattha kāraṇamāha-‘yatheva hi’ccādi, parassāti majjhimassāti ettha visesanaṁ, kaniṭṭhassāpi
anya-e0806n1:145_5: vatticchādibandhaneti vattuno icchā nibandhanaṁ kāraṇamassāti samāso, vatthusabhāve
anya-e0806n1:145_6: vatthu tatthe, abhiniveso pavatti, nābhisambhuṇāti na pappoti.
anya-e0806n1:146_0: “Sakatthe vadhāriyamāne nekasmiṁ dve bhavantīti vattabba”nti (8-1-12-vā) vāttikakārena
anya-e0806n1:146_1: vuttaṁ, tadāha ‘sakatthe’iccādi, atthappakāraṇādyanapekkhassa padassa atthe sakatthe
anya-e0806n1:146_2: avadhāriyamāne ettakameveti gammamāne anekasmiṁ diyyamāne dvibbacanamiṭṭhaṁ mataṁ
anya-e0806n1:146_3: pāṇiniyānanti attho, ayampanesamadhippāyo ‘māsakaṁ māsakaṁ imamhā kahāpaṇā bhavantānaṁ
anya-e0806n1:146_4: dvinnaṁ dehī tyatra dve eva māsā dātumicchitā, kahāpaṇaṁ nāma–
anya-e0806n1:147: Cattāro vihayo guñjā, dveguñjā māsako bhave;
anya-e0806n1:149_0: Vuttavidhinānekamāsakasamudāyo, tattha na sabbe kahāpaṇa sambandhino māsā dānakiriyāya
anya-e0806n1:149_1: byāpitā, dveyevāti netthattha vicchāti yathāvuttavattabbena dvibbacana”nti, taṁ dassetvāti
anya-e0806n1:149_2: taṁ dvibbacanodāharaṇaṁ dassetvā, paṭipādayituṁ vicchāyameva dvittaṁ dassetuṁ… māsakaṁ
anya-e0806n1:149_4: dvibbacanaṁ, tathāhyato dviruttā vicchāva gamyate”ti, saddantaratoccādikaṁ kimāsaṅkiya
anya-e0806n1:149_5: vuttanti āha‘dehī’tiādi, avadhāraṇe patīyamāneti kahāpaṇasambandhini bahumhi māsakasamudāye
anya-e0806n1:149_6: māsakadvayanicchaye viññāyamāne sati, avisesena sāmaññena māsānaṁ dehīti dānakiriyāya
anya-e0806n1:149_8: ‘padene’ccādi, ettha padenāti māsakamiccanena padena, imamhā kahāpaṇāti idamettha
anya-e0806n1:149_9: saddantaraṁ, katābhisaṅkharaṇassāti māsakaṁ māsakamiccevaṁ nipphāditassa, saddantaratoti
anya-e0806n1:149_10: iminā padantarayogo gahitoti āha-‘padantarena yogato’ti ayametthādhippāyo “dvittakaraṇakāle
anya-e0806n1:149_12: dvittaṁ, tadanu pana imamhā kahāpaṇātisaddantarasambandhe sati yadi kahāpaṇasambandhya
anya-e0806n1:149_13: na vasesamāsakavicchā pariggayhati tadā imassa kahāpaṇassāti chaṭṭhiyā bhavitabbaṁ,
anya-e0806n1:149_14: imamhā kahāpaṇāti pana avadhipañcamīniddesato kahāpaṇato dvayameva gahetvā bhavantānaṁ
anya-e0806n1:149_15: dvinnaṁ dehīti imamhā kahāpaṇāti saddantaratovadhāraṇaṁ gamyate”ti.
anya-e0806n1:150_1: vuttaṁ, tadāha-‘pubbapaṭhamānaṁ miccādi, pubbapaṭhamānaṁ pubbapaṭhama saddānaṁ atthātisayo
anya-e0806n1:150_2: yo atthassa pakaṁso, tassa vacanicchāyaṁ, sabbapaṭhamabhāvasaṅkhāta atthātisayamattāva
anya-e0806n1:150_3: vacanicchāti na ettha vicchāti tesamadhippāyo, vikasanakiriyāya pākakiriyāyāti vuttepi
anya-e0806n1:150_5: tyādo, pubbaṁ pubbaṁ vikasanaṁ karonti, paṭhamaṁ paṭhamaṁ vacanaṁ karontīti kiriyāvisesanavasena
anya-e0806n1:150_6: attho daṭṭhabbo, pubbāti matā paṭhamābhimatāti iminā pubbapaṭhamabhāvenābhimatānaṁ
anya-e0806n1:151_0: “Ḍatara ḍatamānaṁ samasampadhāraṇāyamitthīnigade bhāve dve bhavantīti vattabba”nti
anya-e0806n1:151_1: (8-1-12-vā) vuttaṁ, ettha itthiliṅgasaddo itthiliṅgayogā itthīti vutto, nigadyateneneti
anya-e0806n1:151_2: nigado, itthī nigado yassa so itthinigadobhāvo, tasmiṁ itthīnigade bhāve, tadāha-ratararata
anya-e0806n1:151_3: mantāna’miccādi, itthiliṅgeti itthiliṅgaṁ yassa so itthiliṅgobhāvo, tasmiṁ itthiliṅge
anya-e0806n1:151_4: bhāve vattamānānaṁ ratararatamantānaṁ dvibbacanamabhimatanti sambandho, kasmiṁ visayeti
anya-e0806n1:151_5: āha-‘samasampadhāraṇa visaye’ti, samena aḍḍhatādinā guṇena ime ubho aḍḍhā itvevaṁ
anya-e0806n1:151_6: rūpā sampadhāraṇā nirūpanā avabodho samasampadhāraṇā, sāeva visayo, tasmiṁ sati,
anya-e0806n1:151_7: aḍḍhatāya bahuvidhattābhāvā kiriyādiyo gābhāvā ca natthettha vicchāti tesamadhippāyo,
anya-e0806n1:151_8: pucchiyamānāti iminā ime ubho’ iccādīnaṁ pucchāvākyataṁ dasseti.
anya-e0806n1:152_1: ponopuññasaṅkhātakiriyā dhammassa dhanasameva visayattaṁ dīpeti, atisayavisiṭṭhanti
anya-e0806n1:152_2: iminā papacatisaddepakāro pakaṁsattha jotako upasaggoti dasseti, hividhimhīti’lū-cchedane’iccasmā
anya-e0806n1:152_3: vidhimhi hippaccayo “pañhapattanāvidhīsu”ti (6-9) iminā suttenāti attho, ossāti “yuvaṇṇānameopaccaye”ti
anya-e0806n1:152_5: paccayo ce vidhīyate, tadā papacatiiccatra viya ābhikkhaññe vidhīyamānena paccayeneva
anya-e0806n1:152_6: ābhikkhaññatthassa pakāsitattā na dvibbacanena bhavitabbanti dasseti, yadā tu bhusaṁ
anya-e0806n1:152_7: punappunaṁ pacatīti vacanicchā tadāpi papacatīti bhavatyeva.
anya-e0806n1:153_0: Iha imasmiṁ udāharaṇe, ābhikkhaññe iccevāti iminā anukaraṇamattamevetaṁ natthetthābhikkhaññanti
anya-e0806n1:153_1: pāṇiniyā suttantarena dvittampaṭipādenti, natthettha tādisena vacanena payojanaṁ,
anya-e0806n1:153_3: kiriyampati vattatīti bhavanakiriyāmatī vuttīti (potthake) kiriyādhammaṁ ponopuññamettha
anya-e0806n1:153_4: atthevā”ti, teneva vakkhati-‘paṭapaṭā bhavatīti ābhikkhaññe dvibbacana’nti, anitisminti
anya-e0806n1:153_5: itisadde avijjamāne, rāppaccayoti paṭhamaṁ dvitte kate pacchā rāppaccayo, rāppaccayamakatvāpi
anya-e0806n1:153_6: pakārantarena sādhetumāha- ‘athavā’ iccādi, dīgho niccanti paṭhamaṁ dvitte paṭapaṭakarotīti
anya-e0806n1:153_7: ṭhite niccaṁ dīgho, paṭapaṭā karotīti ettha nipphattiṁ dassetvā idāni paṭapaṭāyatīti
anya-e0806n1:155: Ekassa ekassa iti ṭhite pubbavibhattiyā lutte saṁhitāyañca katāyaṁ ekekassa, evaṁ matthakena matthakenāti ṭhite matthaka matthakenāti.
anya-e0806n1:157: Aññaṁ aññanti ṭhite iminā vibhattiyā lope akārassa “tadaminā” (1-47) dinā okāre aññoññantipi hoti.
anya-e0806n1:161: Kvaci pavatyappavatti, kvacaññaṁ kvaci vā kvaci;
